I even like this better than my Titanium wedding band that I lost recently, "It Just Feels Completely Different".  Within 5 minutes I was used to the fit and forgot it was on until I washed up for dinner. Trust in Grooves sizing advice, I'm a big guy with "gnarly knuckles" and my ring finger measures 12 to 12.5 to 13. My Titanium ring was a size 13 but a tad too big. Probably why I lost it,but the smaller sizes felt way too tight,so I got measured and was a 12.5 at the time and the Groove Advice was to go down a size to a 12 and I couldn't be happier! Just snug enough, no circulation problems and with the "design" of the ring I'm not sure if it will ever get snagged on anything!  It's "tapered"smooth, it's not hot, and does not have an odor like some others!  I'm an active bassist and play guitars as well this ring never gets in the way! TRY IT !! THIS IS THE ONE YOU ARE LOOKING FOR!!!

reviewText:
I had high hopes for this ring.
1. It's a better material thing metal for someone who works out.
2. It's very lightweight.
3. It has an awesome cost point.

However, I have been wearing it for less than a day and the ring has caused my finger to become irritated due to chafing.
On the inside of the ring are grooves that are purported to allow the material to "breathe." Um, no. That is complete nonsense. If the ring is sitting against the skin there is no breathing of the material. However, those grooves DO allow water to become trapped under the ring. Thus, the issue I am experiencing.

I kept wearing it (24/7) and after almost a month took it off to find the skin on the underside of my finger dried out and cracked and the top a bit red (see photo).

I let Groove Life know. They were super friendly and understanding, and had not heard of this happening. I ended up returning the ring. Not sure what caused the reaction. Otherwise I loved the ring. I would still recommend it, just be aware of rare cases like this. The price could be lower.
summary: Great ring but I had a skin reaction.

reviewText:
I love these rings!  I have tried several other brands and I have to say these are, by far, the superior silicone ring for several reasons:

1- No "Band-Aid Finger" stink.  Groove Rings really do a better job of keeping your finger dry and comfortable where other rings (even other rings that promise a dry finger) just can't come close.

2- Groove Rings stay flexible and comfortable.  I went on a vacation and really put the ring to the test.  I put on sunscreen, sailed, did some water skiing, swam, and paddleboarded.  Where other rings have become oddly crusty with sunscreen or cracked after drying in saltwater, these rings kept their original comfort and appearance.

3.  Style- Some rings may come in glow in the dark or plain color design, Groove Rings offer the benefits described above AND a stylish design.  The color inside of the ring makes the ring stand out and is especially handy when snatching it from the nightstand before heading to the gym in the early hours of the morning.  The sizing is also spot on...which other rings seem to have an issue with.

All in all, this ring is worth every cent.  I am certainly glad I found Groove Rings.
summary: The perfect flexible ring has arrived!

My wife got this for me for Christmas.
It fit nice and is very comfortable. I work on cars a lot and was looking for a better ring option as I keep marking my rings up, or I lose them after they fall of my tool box or where ever I set it when I took it off and it rolled away never to be seen again. LOL
I loved this thing for the first few days but yesterday my finger turned red and blistered under the ring.  NOT GOOD! It's rather painful.
I am not 100% sure why this happened. I may have gotten soap trapped under it so it may have been partly my fault. Or I might just not be able to wear this material. I'm not sure yet.
The ring seems well made. And looked and felt great for the few days I was able to wear it.
I broke out the most right where there logo is inside of the band. There is no venting there. So that's why I think I might have gotten soap trapped there and it caused the problem. I washed my hands at a department store with there cheap soap about 12 hours before the problem occurred. I have never had a problem like this with metal rings. Or soap in the past. But I am not 100% sure what caused this so I will not blame the ring totally. But I as said I have never had this problem before this ring either.

I plan to give my finger a week to fully heal up and then try the ring again. This time I will be sure to rinse better after washing my hands and see if that solves the problem. If it still comes back then I guess this ring is just not for me.  :(
I really hope it does not come back tho. I LOVE how comfortable this ring is.

I am reporting this now, but I will amend this after my finger heals and I can try the ring again. (3-6 weeks from now I will report back.)
Please note that I have had skin problems in the past and as such am probably more susceptible to things such as this than the average person.
Tho I have never had problems with gloves, or rings before, I have also never tried to wear anything made from silicone before either.
Just trying to be honest here.

Thank you.
summary: Comfortable but may have caused blistering? Not sure yet.

reviewText: This is not Sterling Silver! Within a week the the silver rubbed off revealing copper underneath.

When I first received and reviewed this item, I was so happy with the look and feel of it. However, less than a month later, I'm having to change my opinion. After just a couple weeks of wearing it, I found out that it is just COATED with sterling silver. It started rubbing and flaking off, which wasn't bothering me too much because it's still a beautiful piece. I don't know what the core of the ring is made out of, but it irritated the crap out of my upper lip, septum, and nostrils. My skin was raw and sore, and caused cuts that are still healing.

If you have sensitive skin at all, I recommend that you make sure to buy jewelry that is 100% surgical steel--not just coated.
summary: Silver coating wore off, base material caused painful irritation.

My checks have never felt so well dressed.  I can take them out in public now without embarrassment.  I am particularly joyous over the sturdy duplicate protector flap.  It protects my extra checks from stray marks like Wonder Woman's bracelets protect her from bullets.

So, to sum it up, I  my new checkbook cover.  Thanks Oberon Design for my leather clad beauty...wait, that sounds a little dominatrix-y.  Oh well, if the leather fits, wear it!
summary: Checkbooks have never looked so sexy!

reviewText: My earrings arrived broken and I wrote a review stating that so rated them a 3. I revised my review today as  Mariell CEO personally wrote me after seeing my review and will refund my money and send a new pair of earrings. I love the earrings, they are perfect to wear to my daughter's wedding and this company will make good on any problems with the order. The earrings are beautiful, very sparkly, not heavy and elegant. It restores your faith in companies when you get customer service like this.

These earrings were love at first sight!! Each stone is perfectly cut and reflects an unbelievable amount of light for incredible sparkle. When I put them on, I was surprised that they didn't feel heavy, especially compared to many chandelier-type earrings that I've tried on. The "open back" design behind each stone (see pics) allows for the stones to sparkle from every angle possible (I've never seen this design before - it's genius).

Each earring has 11 perfectly crafted elliptical/lens-shaped CZ stones and is about 1.75" long. The silver around each stone blends in and creates an illusion that the stones are "floating" so to speak. These earrings look so much more expensive than their price tag on Amazon, and they would be perfect for a wide array of dressier events including on your wedding day. They would also make a beautiful gift, and they come carefully packaged in a black gift box.

I am just blown away at how absolutely gorgeous these earrings are. The design, craftsmanship, and quality are insurmountable. I cannot recommend these earrings enough - they will make you feel like a princess, and every girl deserves to feel this way! <3

*Discounted product received for testing and review purposes. All opinions are my own, and I have no affiliation with the seller/company and did not receive any compensation for writing a review.

reviewText: This review is mainly about the material.  Excellent quality material all around. I had a slight issue with how it made me look. I am petite size 0-2 and accidentally ordered an xtra small thinking it would fit. Way too small.  So I ordered a small.  Perfect fit and I wanted this specific one for posture since it goes around the entire back  However,  after it was all fastened,  I looked weird. Not because it didn't fit me but because one,  it pushed my chest up wayy too high and my bra would not sit correctly under it,  and two,  when it's fastened and the straps are around the shoulder,  it just shifts your body in a way that looks very very odd. Almost too large up top, especially if you are small weight wise. So I just ended up ordering the one that just goes around the waist but in the same excellent latex material.  We'll see how that pans out.

The sizing is way off. It's too big really, cinches nothing but can I still work out in it. The seams are weak. Had to repair it where the boning started coming right out. Then it happened in the front where the hooks are. Seemed solid at first, but now I'd say it's not sturdy at all.

This is a brilliant "waist trainer corset". I only put it in quotes, because I am actually using to support my lower back at work. I needed something that was really going to hold me together after I had surgery. And this does the trick, No Velcro involved!!! The issue with Velcro, and support around the tummy and lower body area, is that it starts to wear away fairly quickly. Especially if you use it everyday. And this really holds you in. I love it, I feel so supported and great in it. The only down side is that you have to get really good at hook and eye closure, but I am now a pro. It is heavy weight, doesn't breathe and you sweat in it.  But, since I am using at work, it bothers me not. Awesome. Love it.

However - definitely read the size chart before buying. I am not a 4X. The fitted hoodie I have on right now is an XL, and the leggings I'm wearing are a 2X. But the size 4X is the right fit by this company.

I have been hesitant to purchase any maternity shirts this time around.  We are currently expecting out third child due June 1st.  I haven't popped like you would expect from a third pregnancy. So I wasn't going to dole out a bunch of money on maternity shirts.  Finally my Mom talked me into finding just a few things that I enjoyed.

 Im very picky and didn't want to get anything TOO obviously preggo related; after all, we expect this to be our last child.  I had seen someone I know wearing a shirt with the sides ruched and thought it was downright adorable! The shirt accented her growing bump perfectly without being moo-moo preggo. I needed one instantly! She told me she got it from Motherhood Maternity through Amazon, so here we are!

I toyed around with the purchase for a few days, still not sure if I wanted to actually purchase a maternity shirt, but now I am so glad I did! Now its my go-to comfy, yet adorable pregnancy shirt that pairs very well with black leggings and my favorite boots!

reviewText: Fits as expected
If you want to sweat you're balls off in something that feels like scuba gear under your clothes, by all means, buy it. Otherwise this sucks. Much better products available out there, like Leo Men.

The overall fit of the trainer is great. I love the support it provides and it's discreetness. Unfortunately there are parts of the wear that don't work for my body. The overall  height of the trainer is too long for my torso so the bottom of the trainer digs into my hip bone. It's left a little bruise at the two points on either side of my pelvis. I thought I could bear the poking until one of the steel ribs on the front poked through the fabric and started digging into my hip. I imagine making a product with steel boning in fabric is very difficult.

Ive tried wearing the trainer higher on my torso, but then it sits on my chest. I'm not trying to shape my chest with this thing. Overall I think this product might be made for women, not men seeking to shape and support their gut. A few minor changes for the men's version of this product and this trainer could be five stars.
summary: Probably works better for women seeking rib shaping

I knew I should have purchased a Large from the get go but I wanted to avoid retuning and go by the chart, instead I spent 3$ for one day shipping and had to go through 3 returns to finally be content. Nonetheless, we are happy with the product. It's not "cheap" made, not too feminine and the best part that mine lacks is the torso length. This one is long enough to fit into your jeans and not come out with ever bend or twist. Avoid hunching! This causes the cincher to bunch up a lose its purpose. You will spend most of your cinching days adjusting and trying to pull it back to its original shape. If you want to see results, WORKOUT! Don't just wear it because your lazy and trying to lose inches, it works but the moment you discontinue use it returns after a day. We purchased these to wear during workouts but they help when you feel bloated and women, when it's that time of month. We love our cinchers but we do not use them religiously, were not trying to be like the the KK's or any other social media trash, we just need help with our mid area and these work great. I plan on purchasing my next cincher through them.

reviewText:
I've been on the search for the perfect legging and was hoping these might be it, but they aren't.  For reference purposes, I'm 5'0" tall and 115 lbs and ordered a size small.
The good --
1. These leggings are not see through at all, which is great.
2. I'm petite and these are are good length on me.
The bad --
1. The different colors seem like they are two totally different sizes.
2. The waist is awkwardly high and much tighter than the rest of the leggings.
3. These leggings run large. I'm never an XS in bottoms, but the small is a little baggy especially in the calves. I'm hoping they shrink when I wash them.
Overall, these are a good price and will be fine for lounging around the house, but they are not what I was looking for.
summary: Not see through but weird sizing

I bought these as a gift for my daughter who is a daily leggings wearer. She is a bit of a fanatic when it comes to her leg wear, and her favorite black tights had worn a hole in the knee. These turned out to be great for regular, every day use. The colors of both were true to the pictures. The fit was comfortable. The only issue she had was a bit of bagging in the crotch area, but this was not enough to keep her from keeping or wearing the leggings. reviewText: Love it!

Received free to review. The watch itself is beautiful, no problems. I took one star off for the difficulty of removing extra links. Watch came with no instructions, for adjusting time or for removing links. Adjusting time isn't a problem, but how to remove the links isn't exactly common knowledge. I found out that it doesn't matter which side you push the pins out of because the pins are the same both sides. Further more, you need the right size pin to pound the pins out of the links, and you having to be careful with the hammer so as not to break the wood, as my husband did. We glued the broken piece back on.
I feel that the seller should include a small pin (the cost would be minimal) as well as good instructions on how to remove the extra links. I just happened to find a small pin in my junk drawer that happened to do the job, but somebody else might not be so lucky. My teen son was originally very interested in the watch, but the frustration of not knowing how to remove the links made him lose interest in the watch altogether. Or, you can do as another reviewer recommends and ask a jeweler to do it for you. But really, it's not hard to do if you just have the right sized pin, you can quickly tap the connecting pin out with a hammer.
summary: Hard to remove extra links--ended up breaking wood

reviewText:
The wooden watch I received is a very lightweight and handsome watch. It has a compass face which adds to its Elegance. The wood section has a nice a zebra wood grain pattern. It has a nice and secure fold over metal clasp. It gives the date and time. It has a second hand, too. It has a quartz working system and uses batteries which do come with the watch. It weighs approximately 47 grams. It works well for a casual or dress watch. The wrist band is adjustable to about 8.66 inches. It is about 1.02 inches wide. It is a unisex watch, but men mostly wear this type of Watch. This is water resistant and is not able to be used for swimming, showering, or diving. This watch is completely made my hand. The wood does contain some natural blemishes that just add to its uniqueness. I can easily change the time, but am unable to adjust the calendar section. If there were some directions to explain how to set this function it would be helpful.
I received this wooden watch for a reduced rate for my review, however, my opinion is my own and unbiased.
Love the watch and the price. The only downfall is the size, too big for my style but I'll get used to it, other than that 5 stars.

This is such a unique and cool watch I decided to order this for my teenage son. He likes to wear a watch, and at times likes to find a different one and change it up, instead of always wearing the same one. I had no idea this was completely made by hand with zebra wood - until I read the whole description before ordering! Amazing

I knew this would be right along his style. It is a casual looking watch, but so unique in the look. I have never seen one like this in a wood look. His friends have been really interested in getting one, and have asked me where to order it from!

It does have an adjustable wrist size, and is analog. It is not for swimming or diving but it is water resistant which is great. It has auto date, perpetual calendar and is non toxic hypoallergenic!

I have to say I was truly surprised by the quality and how light weight this watch is- I examined it and held it prior to wrapping it. My son expressed the same immediately after he opened it- and put it on.

It truly looks wonderful s d it is definitely an eye catcher. Mostly because you do not tend to see a watch made of or looking like wood!

I did give it this my son as a gift,  and was so impressed with the nice box that it comes in. He can use that to place it in when he is not wearing it.

I was able to order this at a promotional price in exchange for my honest unbiased opinion. All opinions are my own and have not been influenced in any way. My time spent on any product review is not compensated in any way. I do not have a relationship with sellers and manufacturers. I base all my reviews on quality, value, and personal experience of the product.
summary: Very happy son with this unique watch! I was truly impressed!

I could see the print of my underwear through the pants. These will still work for me but if I were going to a gym or somewhere. in public I probably wouldn't wear them. 3- these pants aren't a true black I would say once they are on they appear to be more of a charcoal color. So overall I would say I think these leggings are cute (the print of the fabric appears just like it does in the photo) but I don't think that I can wear them in public without worrying that people are viewing my underwear.

The pockets are functional which was a plus. Nice with a pocket watch.

I love these Woolrich vests so much I bought all three colors.  The first one I bought was XXL and it fit well (although at the time I usually took a L or XL).  I lost a lot of weight and figured I could wear a M, so I ordered another in M.  It was way too tight so I used their super easy and convenient return (everything is in the box) and reordered it in L.  I lost some more weight and ordered another vest in L and had the original vest tailored to fit.  I love wearing these vests and now feel somewhat undressed without one on.  They are perfect for around horses because the wool does not show or retain stains even if the horse wipes his nose on you.  Washing them in Woolite leaves them soft and nice looking without the bother of having them dry cleaned.  I have received a lot of positive comments regarding these vests.  I only wish they came in brighter colors (like canary yellow or tattersall), but that's not for everybody.  If unsure of your size, be sure to order one at least a size larger and besides, it is easy for a tailor to make an oversized vest fit, but impossible if it's too small.  You will feel like a million bucks when you have your vest on -- you may even be tempted to wear a tie.
summary: You will probably buy all three

Especially when it comes to costume style Jewlery as I believe there is a thin line between nice and tacky. This piece is very nice! It feels great on. Not heavy. The packaging was very impressive, it looked as though someone really cared that i wouldn't get a broken necklace. My necklace was shipped in a bubble wrap padded envelope and inside my necklace as in a little bubble wrap pouch which also included a little mesh pouch that i liked, which was all wrapped in bubble wrap taped 2x around with the clear packaging tape. So that definitely impressed me from that start. Though my necklace is a little more darker than that of the pic it still definitely is aqua still though so its not really a DRASTIC color difference. I can't wait to wear it.

(AMZ review so I got a discount on it but like always gonna give my honest opinion for what the product is worth)

I love the color aqua/bright turquoise. It's so beachy and fun that it's hard to resist getting everything you own in that color, including jewelry. This necklace is a great accompaniment to any aqua-lover's collection, myself included.

Unlike most jewelry I've received or bought from Amazon, this actually feels really well built and not horribly cheap. All of the links on the golden chain are closed/soldered together, and it even comes with a few inches of extension in case you want to layer it or make it longer. The aqua pieces themselves are some type of enamel-esque material that's bright and glossy and feels nice in your hands. It's heavy and feels as though it could have been bought from somewhere way higher-end than Amazon.

As for wearing it, I haven't had any issues so far. It feels okay on my skin and hasn't left any green or black marks. In fact, I'm hoping to wear this to a job interview tomorrow! The only thing that seems slightly different is that the triangles are all the same size, whereas in the picture the outer triangles look slightly smaller. I don't mind this at all. I think it's a very cute look and can work for many different styles. The good thing is, the necklace isn't as dramatic as some bib-type necklaces. The triangles are about 1.5 to 2 inches big, roughly, so it's great for making a statement without being "extra".

I like this piece. For me, it's an introduction to bib-necklaces and statement pieces. I don't have anything like this at all in my jewelry collection and it inspires me to search for more unique pieces like this. I live on the beach too, so it's great to have something fun and bright and cheerful to wear with all my tropical styled clothes that also looks professional. It's a solid little necklace and has great potential!

I was given a discount on this item in exchange for an honest review. All of my thoughts, musings, and opinions are strictly my own and will never be swayed by promises of free or discounted products. If you liked my review or found it helpful, please feel free to click the "helpful" button below!

This one is definitely worth the buy as I can already tell this is going to be a necklace that I will wear for a long time. I love the fit of it as well.

This is a necklace that will definitely dress up any outfit, appropriate for work, a night out, or a date night (in my opinion). I have now worn this with a t-shirt and jeans and also with a button up over my collar with slacks (for work) and it worked well with both outfits.

I would definitely recommend this necklace to anyone wanting to add a versatile statement piece of jewelry to their collection. I got mine in black to be able to wear it with more clothing options.

Disclaimer: I did receive this necklace in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: This is a necklace that will definitely dress up any outfit!

reviewText:
This necklace took about two weeks to arrive but it was worth the wait. It is a gold chain with black triangles going from small to large in size then large to small. The black triangles have a thin dainty gold line outlining them. The necklace is the perfect accent necklace because it is not too big, nor too small. The chain is adjustable so you are able to put it as high or as low as you'd like. The necklace did not leave any residue on my skin or my clothes which is a great plus. The necklace has also kept its gold color and it has not turned my skin green at any moment. I have zero complaints about this accessory and would recommend it to anyone.

I was given this product at a discounted price and in return I have offered to review the product. I have given this product an honest and unbiased opinion based on my personal experience. Thank you!
summary: The necklace is the perfect accent necklace because it is not too big

reviewText: This is a beautiful necklace! I thought it was going to be light weight and made of plastic because of the price, but wow I actually got more than what I paid for. It's weighted nicely and the color is beautiful. I bought the turquoise one. I didn't like that shipping and handling would almost be the same price as the necklace itself, but now that I know that I like it, I'd be willing to buy another one in black. The length is not adjustable however it sits just in line with my collar bone so it's perfect. It came with a soft black pouch to keep in as well which is nice. I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

Very beautiful necklace especially for the price. I was hoping it wouldn't be too large and gaudy. I was pleasantly surprised at the size which is perfect for me. On the smaller side and you can also adjust the length. I will be buying more in other colors!
Great necklace. Simple, yet statement piece. Enamel is very smooth.

So I received my necklace last week and have already used it several times and I love it. My order shipped and arrived as promised, and it was packaged really well. I love the fact that it came with a small drawstring bag for storage. The color is awesome not to bright and it did look just like the picture. I do wish that the necklace could be adjustable, you can only wear at one length. The necklace is made from a high quality metal alloy and is very beautiful. I would recommend to anyone looking for quality jewelry at a reasonable price.
summary: High Quality At A Great Price

What a classy looking briefcase/bag. It's thick PU leather but it smells and feels like real leather. There's room inside to fit my 14" or 15" laptop plus there's a padded pouch inside to carry smaller laptops or tablets. It has an attached handle and an adjustable strap that can be attached so it can be carried over your shoulder or across your body. The outside has two zipper pockets, one in the front and one in the back, and they would both fit a cell phone. There's also an open pocket in the front. The inside zips and then the leather flap folds over and has faux buckles that actually snap. The stitching all looks good and I didn't find any coming apart.

This is a very professional looking briefcase and I really like the vintage style (maybe 'cuz I'm vintage myself).  :-)

When I looked to see if it could be returned so I could get my money back, the receipt said that if any tags were removed, the original packaging was missing or if the bathing suit had been worn, it could not be returned. Thankfully it only cost me $20. It serves me right for buying such a cheap bathing suit but I want others to be aware.

Having been privileged to review both the red and blue crystal necklaces here is my take on them both. For those of you who like to change things up a little, this blue heart, multi-faceted crystal which is "roped" in white gold plating that is embedded with clear crystals could well be for you. The heart is approximately 1" x 1 1/4" so on the larger size. This necklace is quite heavy in the fact that you know you are wearing it. The three stranded leather chain is approximately 18". Pretty and a little different from other fashion jewelry. I LOVE it.

The red heart crystal (1" x 1 /8" x 3/8" deep) is encased in rose gold plated embedded clear crystals which actually goes well with the 'rose gold' 17 1/2" rope chain.

PLEASE note that this review is for both the BLUE and RED HEART Crystal necklaces and  NOT the clear crystal. Would I recommend these to others? Yes! Product provided in exchange for an honest review. Thanks, Liz
summary: ~~ Blue Heart or Red Heart? Which would you like? ~~

This necklace is so pretty. It has a very unique design that really compliments the white gold chain.

The chain is just a little thinner than I generally like because thin chains like this tend to break easily. Thankfully this has lasted a few wearings without having one single issue. The clasp is a lobster claw style clasp and is very sturdy and holds very tightly.

The stone on this chain is one of the prettiest designs I have ever seen. I is a completely colorless white heart shaped stone with the most beautiful squiggle design wrapping around the heart. The accent piece is very heavy and sturdy and will be one of those classic designs tht last the years.

I was so glad to be able to try this necklace at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

The strap is detachable, and I can easily stick this in my bigger purse and use it as a wallet, if I choose to do so. It has two main compartments and a small one that you can put your cash or other small items like lipstick into and not lose in the deeper pockets.

Overall, it's too small for me but may work for someone else. It seems durable enough. Not bad for the cost.

The wallet measures 10.3 x 7.1 cm. It is a little wider than a standard credit card (see the attached picture). Empty, the wallet itself is very slim and when full the materials do not add much to its total size.

However, I cannot recommend this product because the quality of materials and durability is poor. Many reviews praise these wallets as great with little other details. Beware of reviews that are not verified purchases!

About a month after using the Havok ID wallet one of the sealed edges came undone. This revealed the materials underneath - paper. I don't care if the wallet is made from paper as long as it is functional and durable, and unfortunately this wallet is not. It does look good though. If you want a wallet that is slim, this one is, but if you want it to last for more than a month, keep looking.

reviewText: I love this wallet! I only carry like 2 cards and my license, so this wallet was made for me. If you hate big wallets and only want to carry what you need, than this wallet is for you. Its super slim and feels great in the pocket. Almost like I'm carrying nothing. I'm pretty OCD when it comes to things in my pockets, if it bulges out at all I can't handle it. This wallet doesn't do that at all.

Product arrived quickly and was as expected. EXCELLENT product. Exactly what I was looking for. The credit card pockets still hold and grip onto my cards really well, so I haven't dealt with any issues of my cards falling out of their sleeves. The leather is VERY durable and isn't some fake polyester/leather blend you'll see on cheaper wallets. Holds all the cards I carry around comfortably, and I can store something extra in the middle pocket (cash/card/etc.) Just what I needed and great quality. I like the color. It is definitely compact which will work nice in a small purse or I can just carry it by itself in my pocket on short trips.

I ordered this recently to see how it would fit all of the items in my wallet to see if I could get away from carrying around my huge wallet. Surprisingly, even with its very thin structure, I was able to put my ID, 3 insurance cards, 3 bank cards, and one membership card in the wallet. If I did not have the other cards, I'd be able to put cash in the middle, so I will still have to have another place to put cash, but it does what I intended it to do.  The slim design will fit more discreetly in my purse and I really like that.  I did receive this product at a discounted price  in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
summary: Slim design that will fit discreetly in my purse

reviewText:
This is a great wallet for hitting the club or to wear inside your coat pocket. It is slim and just over the size of a credit card.  It has one slot on each side.  One side has a clear overlay so you can show your ID without removing it.  The other side is perfect for your credit card.  The inside pocket is great for a few dollars in cash or several business cards.

It's made of genuine leather and has the brand name embossed on the outside.  It's well made and the cards slide out easy.  To easily open the center slot, just squeeze the edges of the wallet a little and it will open up.

My husband is using this inside his coat pocket where he keeps several business cards at.

I received this wallet at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.  If, after continued use, my opinion changes, I will update my review.
summary: This is a great wallet for hitting the club or to wear inside ...

reviewText:
The dress is absolutely not at all what is photographed.  Mine arrived  much larger than previously reviewed by others... aside from that the bodice is not at all an empire but more of a high waisted. The bodice is cut larger than the skirt too so if you're large busted with small hips this will fit you.  The fact that its not an empire gives it a weird look on. Additionally, I am 5 ft 5 inches and this dress comes to my ankles.
I'm trying to decide if I will adjust the bodice by detaching and re-sewing the bodice to make it an empire...  but I will be shortening it even more by doing that so probably the best idea is just to return it. I received this item at a discounted price for an unbiased review.  This is a very pretty set of jewelry.  It is not heavy and has a very beautiful fluidity.  It doesn't have any sharp edges and looks very well made/put together.  I have no complaints, it is just as pretty in person as it is in the picture.  I like that the rope part of the necklace has two strands and the colors are fantastic.  It looks great!

I am so impressed with this set that I look forward to Jewelry Ace releasing more selections in their line of jewelry. The set Is modern and edgy.  It will go with formal to casual wear. In the attached picture I am wearing it with a beige tank and black jeans and it completes the outfit.

At first I thought the earrings were going to be too heavy, but they actually laid perfectly on my ears without sagging and were not heavy at all. I was able to wear them all day long and they did not irritate or cause my ear lobes to hurt. The necklace is hollow and very lightweight as well. All the Austria bare crystals and Czech rhinestones shine brilliantly.

The length of the necklace is adjustable and comes with a lobster claw clasp.

It is a unique set that gets plenty of compliments and looks.

Arrives nicely boxed in a pink velvet gift box.

Disclaimer:  Product sample provided for free or discounted for an honest unbiased review with no means of payment or incentives offered in exchange.

Before I leave a review for any jewelry I make sure to wear it for a few days so I can comment on any issues that may come from wearing costume jewelry. I tend to be allergic to some materials and metals, and hate wearing necklaces that irritate or rub off when you wear them. This set is absolutely gorgeously packaged in a soft pink velvet case. It makes it completely appropriate for gift giving with no additional wrapping needed. The necklace is on a double chain and closes in the back with a rather small lobster clasp. Despite it's small size I had no problems opening and closing it on my own. It also has an extender chain which I took full advantage of. After wearing it for 2 full days I was happy to see that I had no allergic reactions to the metals of this set. The color did not rub off, nor did I develop a rash. The earrings require pierced ears and do not dangle. They are a beautiful match to the necklace and are comfortable to wear. While they are fairly big, they do not feel heavy. I applied a single coat of clear nail polish to the studs to prevent any possible allergic reaction. Overall I am very pleased with this set. They look beautiful with just about any outfit and are comfortable to wear. I am thrilled that I received a sample at no cost to me in exchange for my honest review. While I do not always rate products a 4 or a 5 star, I will do so when I feel a product is worthy of such a rating. I do not hesitate recommending this set to anyone!

reviewText: Love this set! It is truly beautiful up close. The photo here does not do it justice! I love this piece!

This necklace & earring set caught my eye immediately when I first stumbled across it during a browsing session. I put it in my cart, but decided to save it for a later purchase. Over the next hour, however, I was compelled to keep bringing the page up for another look. Naturally I broke down and ordered it that same day!  It arrived a few days ago and I was excited to see it in person. It came in a large, sturdy gift box. I was perplexed by the choice of a pale pink box for this particular set, since it not only did nothing to highlight the pieces, the effect was actually off-putting. Since I bought it for myself it was not a big deal, but if it had been a gift, I think I would have repackaged the items in a neutral-colored box, which would have made the pieces really stand out. Anyhow, I donned the necklace immediately, right over my Pink Floyd t-shirt. It was a bit looser than a choker, but there's about an inch worth of extending links in case you want a little more length. The clasp was sturdy and there were no loose pieces. The pierced earrings were in equally good shape, and they did not have that too heavy feeling that makes my earlobes hurt for days afterwards. The necklace is made even more unique looking because there're actually two very fine chains on each side of the centerpiece, something I hadn't noticed in the picture, but found to be a quite pleasant surprise. Yesterday, my first outing since the order arrived, I simply wore black jeans and a black t-shirt, and the set looked amazing. It was not too much for the middle of the afternoon, but I think this set can easily be worn at an evening out as well. It's already obvious to me that this is going to be a favorite set of mine, and I'm already anticipating wearing it with other outfits. I am extremely pleased I decided to order this set!
summary: Amazing-looking Necklace& Earring Set! Wonderful Purchase!

I've only had this for a week but so far I LOVE it!  I love the sparkle and it makes me smile.  The ring too big for the finger I bought it for but I can't fault anyone but me for that.  But so far very please with the quality and the product.

Seriously impressive quality! It looks like a real, high quality ring from a designer line. I bought it big to accommodate swelling while pregnant since my actual wedding set no longer fits; I am very happy and my husband was even impressed. Quality is great. Prongs are tight and strong and the band is a good thickness. The higher quality steel means no fingers turning green. Love it!

I really wish that this had come in half sizes, I wear an 8.5 on my ring finger, so I ordered a 9 and hoped for the best. It's a wee bit too big, but I ordered a ring guard to make it a little tighter. First, let me say that the Asscher cut is my favorite, it's simply gorgeous. I bought this ring on a lightning deal, so I think it was a fair price. The CZ's around the center stone sometimes look weird to me, fake - and other times they sparkle brightly. This ring is an absolute knock-out in the sun. I stare at it well longer than I should. Yes, you can tell it's not a real diamond, that doesn't take away from its beauty. I feel the ring is true to size. It came in a lovely box, and with Swarovski certificate. I'm really really happy with this ring.
summary: Is it real? who cares, it's gorgeous!

reviewText:
The Metal ButtonUp - Collar Stays Button Hook / Helper are great for any man that wants his collar to stay straight throughout the day.

The Metal ButtonUp - Collar Stays Button Hook / Helper are made from high quality metal, and do not bend or misshape.

The Metal ButtonUp - Collar Stays Button Hook / Helper comes in 3 sizes so that all of your collars will be able to stay straight all day long, no matter the size of the collar.

I would 100% recommend these to any man who wants their collars to stay straight through out the day.

I received this product for at a discount in exchange for my honest & unbiased review. All opinions are honest and my own.

DISCLAIMER: I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

These collar stays are one of those great simple products that make your life just a little bit easier. I've been needing a good solid set of stays for awhile, and I thought, if I could get a little added benefit of making buttoning easier, why not? It turns out, not only are these extremely solid stays (that are sure to survive more than a few accidental trips through the washer), the button functionality actually works pretty well! I will say, it takes some getting used to. At first, it was much quicker to just button up by hand, but after a few tries, I was able to really get it down! Now, not only do they work well as stays, but they're a great little utility as well. Highly recommended!

My husband is always losing his collar stays or I forget to take them out before washing his shirts and they get damaged.  When I came across the ButtonUp I thought they would be perfect.  If they accidentally got put into the washing machine they wouldnt get ruined.

The set comes with three pairs of collar stays ranging in size.  Each collar stay has a button hook helper on the end which is a great bonus as it is something that I will use as well.  I often rely on my three year old to help me button my sleeves when I just cannot get them.  This can be time consuming as it often takes her some time to handle the small buttons.  The collar stays are made of quality metal that isn't easily bent.  The set comes in a hard plastic storage case so that I will always know where they are.  We are very happy with these collar stays and the convenience they provide us.
I was given the opportunity to purchase this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Durable collar stays with built-in button hook

reviewText: Product arrived quickly and as described. Came in a little container with different sized collar stays and usage instructions. I have used these, in different sizes, for a few days now and it does work as advertised. It takes some getting used to, and minimal practice, to take your collar stays in and out as well as getting your sleeve buttons working. Definitely worth a try if you have trouble with those sleeves. As a plus, the rigid stays make the collar very sharp looking.  I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

I received this product at a discounted price to provide an honest review. reviewText:
I'm not exactly well versed in the world of ankle chains, so I'm not sure what I was expecting?  It arrived in a small packet that looked to be about 100 tiny braided chains knotted together.  However, upon taking it out, the chains easily separated from each other making the shape of the anklet obvious.  My wife put it on, but it's either meant for a REALLY large foot or an arm, because this thing hung off her foot completely.  I opted not to provide a picture, as I didn't want to detract anyone from potentially purchasing it due to her tiny foot!  It was a very clean design and simple to put on.  I just felt that it was slightly too large to be considered an ankle bracelet.  Even with my lack of knowledge on the subject.  Also, I felt they could have provided a box to properly display it.  If given as a gift, someone's going to wonder what it's supposed to be?

I received this product in exchange for an unbiased/honest review.

The fact we received them for free has no bearing on our review, and we have written negative reviews in the past for products we were sent for free. But we tend to accept more review invitations for quality products, so that's why many of these invited reviews have high ratings. Also, for this type of invited review, we always begin with a disclaimer.)

This ankle chain is quite pretty, but it was too big for my wife. She had to dig out the tools and shorten the chain in order to have it fit the size of her foot.

If she lets it hang the way it is shown in the photo, as soon as she starts walking around, it'll start to pile up on one side and it didn't look good. In order to have it stay in place, she had to pull the chain up higher above so it's tighter, but that ends up feeling uncomfortable due to the tightness required to keep it in place.

She's not the type to give up comfort for beauty, so she won't be using it as an ankle bracelet (and using it as an arm bracelet also has the problem of causing the feeling of tightness). What she'll do instead is to turn it into a necklace instead.
summary: Not comfortable if you don't want the chain hanging lower than the sole of your foot.

I ordered three totally different bags to compare for airline travel (at my own expense, none provided free). They all have their perks, and you can find my other reviews on Travelon and neatpack (medium toiletry bag) product sites on Amazon.  I love the way this Sakroots "Artist Circle Critter Travel Bag" looks. It is a really attractive pattern and will admit the primary reason I purchased it. As far as functionality,  the neatpack medium toiletry bag was best for airline travel (ordered two of them;  one for packing in carry-on suitcase & one for college student who has to share a bathroom). The leopard print Travelon was the best quality, made the best use of its space and held the most toiletries (even full-size bottles upright) for non-airline travel.

Sakroots Artist Circle Critter Travel review:
~Really pretty & compact when zipped
~Handle to carry
~Three compartments (satin interior, stiff plastic front) / small, medium & large
~No way to separate items within the 3 compartments
~Bottom can hold larger bottles
~Metal hook (not full-sized, but stores neatly)
~Exterior very well made with beautiful vibrant colors sakroots is known for
~Great for short trips (maybe overnight or special venue can carry jewelry small top compartment, makeup middle, & toiletries bottom)
~So pretty, but adds more weight for airline travel than the medium Neatpack nylon bag of similar size, yet carries less in a jumbled manner

reviewText: I bought a 5 pack of these about a year ago. I've been very pleased with my purchase. I got one of each of the colors in the package. Each bra came in its own ziplock pouch. The bras are well made and were well packaged. The padding for each bra is the same color as the bra, which I think is very cool! I even saved the pouches they came in to use for other things in my lingerie drawers because they were so nicely made. The bras are snug but comfortable (and I wear the padding), but when working out I prefer them that way. If I'm a little bloated, they can be a little too snug. I had some trouble putting the bras on when I first received them, but I've since figured out that if I put the bra on open like a shirt, then push aside the little flap at the bottom of the zipper & zip it up over my chest above my boobs, I can pull it down over my boobs, do a wee bit of adjusting and voila! The bra is on! I've washed them several times and they have retained their color and the zipper has had no problems. However, because they are synthetic, I wash them in cold water and let them air dry. I'm a 40D. I ordered the XXL.

reviewText: I bought a set of these for myself - they are GREAT for running, and fit well (I went by the size chart provided by B Bang - typically I would wear a S/M top, but was advised to order L and it fits perfectly).  Then I ordered this set for my daughter - she says they're more comfortable than wearing a regular bra so she wears them all the time, not just for exercise.  One other thing I would add is that I've found I have to protect the delicate skin area underneath the bottom zipper cover (with a band-aid) when I wear this bra to go for a run, otherwise it rubs the skin off.  And it's also easier to put the bra on (over the head) with the zipper closed than to try to zip it up while holding everything in - just a tip!  But un-zipping to take off (when sweaty from exercise) is exactly why I bought them - SO much better than a standard sports bra!
summary: These bras are wonderful, but be sure to use the sizing chart provided by B Bang

reviewText: I purchased these front zip bras to wear post-breast surgery as my usual sports bras that go over my head would not work for me. The bras are reasonably cute, but there were a few big problems. #1.  Way small. I am a 36B. Normally I would buy a size M in a sports bra. Based on the sizing chart, I ordered a size L. It was quite snug initially, but I thought they would work. But post surgery, I had some swelling in my chest and it was so uncomfortably tight that I felt like a sausage. It was horrible. I couldn't wait to get home to get the bra off. At 128 lbs, I never thought I would need an XL, but that is what I probably should have purchased. #2. Zippers not great. Because the bra was so tight it was hard to pull up (especially post surgery with limited arm mobility). One of the zipper pulls broke on the 2nd time I wore the bra. I had to use a safety pin to pull the zipper - didn't work great and was a hassle. #3. Poor stitching on one bra. One of the bras was stitched poorly up the front and resulted in some itchy fabric against my skin. I had to place some gauze between the bra and my skin to keep from itching raw. Bottom line - I wish I liked these bras more because they seemed like a great value, but there were too many issues.  I would like to return these bras but not sure it is worth the hassle.
summary: Too small - zipper pull broke - mediocre stitching

I will try again after my swelling goes down but if you are getting these for post surgery I would go a size larger than you think you need.

reviewText:
I diliberated on sizes after reading all of the reviews but ultimately decided on the XL 4 pack as I wanted these for casual wear and not necessarily for exercising.

I'm 5'5 and 128lbs and a full 34D; I measure around my rib cage at the band location at exactly 30 inches and 37.5 inches across the fullest part of my chest. I typically would have ordered the Large based in the size chart in the description, but I didn't want to struggle to zip these up or feel like I was wearing a compression bra (and as one reviewer stated-needing to be cut out of the bra. No thanks!)

I received 4 bras including a blue, purple, tourquiose, and blackish-grey bra. The colors are nice and vibrant and as pictured. They fit great, however the straps over my shoulders are slightly loose (the band is just right-not restricting but not gapping). I definitely wouldn't go running in these!  There is not enough strap support and I would love to have some way to adjust the straps tighter. I'm hoping they will shrink a bit once washed. Despite the straps being a little loose, I noticed these bras are also lower cut/dip down in the front more than my standard pull over the head sports bras.

I had no issues zipping these up (as other reviewers stated) and I'm afraid if I had purchased the Large size the band would be too tight and it would be difficult to latch and pull up the zipper.

I love the light removable padding, colors, quality of the zipper and bra overall. I hope this helps you if you are struggle to decide on a size to buy.

I was SO disappointed by these...I wanted to love them! They have a nice-feeling material, I loved that you get a pack of 5, and once I was able to hoist my 36DD bust into them and get the zipper done, they were actually relatively supportive (I'd say low to medium impact, there was certainly bounce)...HOWEVER. 3 out of the 5 were never even able to stay zipped (zipper just undid itself from the bottom instantly) and the other two I wore once, then the next time I tried to zip them, the zipper broke. If you're a B or smaller I imagine they might work better---but TRUST ME, these zippers do not stand up to big boobs.
summary: Fell apart before I could even wear them--I wouldn't bother.

reviewText:
Ok, so after reading many reviews and asking questions, I decided to order the XXL. For size reference, I'm 5'2, 120-125 lbs, 30GG in Fantasie brand bras, my ribs, under my breasts, measure 29 inches. So, I'm petite and very chesty, pretty active and I NEED tight sports bras, so I know what tight fitting is and this is NOT tight at all. I'm not buying these to work out with though. I'm buying these to use as post-op bras for my breast reduction in October. I heard you should go a few sizes bigger to accommodate for swelling and these reviews are all over the place! Even at my current size, they covered me, they zipped fine, the band was not tight or overly loose, but definitely not enough support for my current size to attempt to workout in, but I need underwire sports bras because of my size. These bras have no adjustments, so being short, I will need to take in the shoulder straps probably an inch at my current size, so once reduced, I may need to take them in more. I am planning on ordering a smaller size, but wondering how the coverage will be, but I'll take my chances because at $7.05 per bra if you buy the 5 pack, you can't go wrong! I hear you need a few to change out often, so $35 for 5 bras or $35+ for one bra, you decide what is the better deal. Plus, the zipper front I believe will be great vice a bunch of hooks.

Shipping: I ordered them last week and they arrived in 2 days as prime shipping promises. I ordered this early because a lot of reviews mentioned not receiving their order for weeks, so I was planning ahead and they came what earlier than expected.

Bras: They are 5 different colors, which are great, and came in 5 individually wrapped zip lock type bags.

I'm not sure if people are not reading the size chart correctly or do not know their real bra size, which most women do not wear the correct size, so I can't wait to see what the Small or Medium fits like because that's going off my band size. So, even with the shoulder straps being long and the band NOT being tight enough for my liking, I am still happy with my purchase, just need to order a smaller size.

Hope this helps future purchases! Make sure you know your right bra size before ordering. Also, sports bras are supposed to be tight! You are working out and need to be supported, not flopping all over the place! That's just my liking though because I run and do high intense workouts that need the girls to stay put, but I need underwire. These would be more suited for walking, yoga,  light activities. Maybe when I'm smaller, ill see about a bra like this for working out again, but once I tried underwire sports bras, which like most probably think they wouldn't be comfortable, they are awesome! Especially if you are a DDD or bigger.

As I mentioned above, I bought these mainly for post-op bra purposes and I think they are awesome! Now I just have to wait until my surgery.
summary: Great Post-Op Bras, do NOT think they run small either...

First off: I've purchased two orders of these, the set of 4, and the set of 5, a week later. In size large and extra large respectively. I very much like the fabric and the fit of the cups for both sizes. The band's under the busy however run small and can be too tight depending on your preferences.

About Me: (In relation to product, size, reason for purchase, etc) I am 21 years old, 5'2", and weigh 143lbs. The circumference of my underbust is 33inches, therefore my bra size could be a 36/38/B/C depending on the bra of course. I have recently gained about 35lbs due to health issues and will be starting physical therapy next month, hence my need for sports bras. I prefer that they zip in the front because they are easier to get on and off. I needed something that was comfortable, yet supportive, because with my weight gain I have gone from an A Cup to a C Cup roughly.

My Experience: These bras come individually packed in custom zipper bags (see photos posted by other reviewers) however do not have any tags to indicate a "new item", like many of us are used to seeing. Don't let that deter you from buying the bras, they arrived spotless, free of wrinkles, and very much brand new.

I initially purchased the 4 pack, size Large, using the size chart available. But when I tried them on I had a difficult time zipping them due to a "lack of slack" and they were too tight around my under bust to be comfortable despite being very supportive and conformingly comfortable in the cups (once successfully zipped).

I kept them because I know once I'm able to exercise again I will lose an inch or two here and there and the size Large will be snug enough to provide control over my "girls" while running and HIIT type of exercise.

Moving on, I then purchased the 5 pack, in Size Extra Large, to use for now and then later as an every day/yoga/ lazy day bra. The extra large are easier to zip than the large for me, they provided the right amount of "extra slack" needed. However, they are still slightly too tight under my bust to be comfortably worn all day. For an hour of exercise though, they do the trick.

Other Factors: The quality and colors are amazing. I have washed both sets and they did not run, the colors are vibrant, and the foam cup inserts actually match the color of the bra which was a nice surprise when I discovered that. I am very happy with the quality and the little extra touches like the matching cups, and even the fabric zipper covers on both ends.

The price is where it's at, I purchased 9 zipper closure sports bras that are FLATTERING AND SUPPORTING for under $60 and received them in two days with prime shipping. 9 awesome bras, for the price of one seemingly overpriced Victorias Secret sports bra with the same zipper closure.

Why Not 5 Stars? : The sizing is a tad frustrating. These are made in China and I do believe they are more of "Asian" sizes than "U.S." or "European". I mean no disrespect. Only that Asians are more naturally petite so these bras absolutely do run small. Not so much a cup size problem, as they are stretchy and hug your curves accordingly, but the circumference of the band in relation to the size of an average woman's under bust measurement is off, and runs tight. But as I said in the beginning, it's all about personal preference.

I love these bras, I only wish they came in an XXL, then they would be a perfect 5 star product.

reviewText:
First, I received this cap free for testing and review. I recognize that a review of a free product is something fundamentally different from that of a product for which one has paid but I do believe such reviews can be useful when the process is respected and I've tried to do that here.

What you're getting with this order:
(1) Flat cap, imitation leather

What is this, and why might I want it?:
A flat cap has many different names, paperboy, golf etc... but the look is unmistakable, a short, stiff brim with a rounded top the comes almost to the edge of that brim.  This one is NOT real leather (you should realize that simply by looking at the price) but a soft "pleather" which I believe is polyurethane.  It has an elastic band and is one size fits all.  Please note that at the posting of this review the cap is being offered at the lower end of the budget price point at under $8 and will be judged as such.

Build: The build far exceeds my expectations for a sub $8 hat.  I honestly didn't know one could still buy a hat for under ten bucks.  This is NOT leather it is pleather.  It is thin and quite soft but the cap is well made. Stitching has no flaws, the shape is correct and the fit is good. I've been wearing it a few times a week for about a month and haven't had issues with durability.

Appearance: Classic flat cap. Pleather does look like real leather on first glance.

Fit: One size fits all. Mine fits me quite comfortably and it is so light, I almost can almost forget it's on. It doesn't breathe well though and so I find myself doffing it now and again when the temps are up.

Anything else of note?: At the posting of this review, the cap is being offered with free shipping allowing one to keep the cost under $8.

Any negatives?: For a less than $8, I don't really have any complaints.  But as mentioned, it doesn't breathe really well so if you run hot like me, you'll notice.

Bottom line: Be honest here, did you know you could still buy a hat for less than ten bucks?  Is this a high quality hat build wise? Of course not. But it's better than costume quality, you can actually wear this out (I have and do) and it looks pretty damned good all things considered.  If you're looking for a leather flat cap that will last for years, keep looking as this is neither leather nor is it thick enough to last for years. If you're looking for a flat cap that looks the part and has you spending less than $8, then this is your hat.  Enjoy!
summary: You can still buy a hat for less than ten bucks?

The quality is great, and not just for the price.  Both the fabric and the stitching are very well done and even.  Fabric is fairly thick, so nothing is see-through.

I'm 5'5", 32G bust, 30 waist, and 39 hips, and I ordered an XL.  The waist is every so slightly not as fitted, but I can easily take in the excess material.

The only reason that I did not give this product 5 stars is because the yellow portion of the dress does not go down as far as the picture on me.  I was really hoping that it would go down to my waist, but it only covers the bust area on me.  I saw other user's pictures, and they did not have the same problem, so it's probably just my ladies taking up too much real estate.

The dress is very striking, and my husband loves it.  I just think it calls a bit more attention to my bust than I typically like.

Overall, great purchase!

I find these quite comfortable, even though there is no cushioning. The footbed is sculpted to cradle the heel and the ball of the foot. The arch support in this slide is a little low for me ( and lower than the furry slippers), but the overall fit is excellent, and really helps with my fasciitis and joint issues in a metatarsal bone.

My daughter and I were looking for modest swimsuits, and these were a beautiful choice. When you go to put it on, make sure the ruffly part ends up on your chest and not your back, cause it is a bit confusing. We got 3 different colors, and none of them really matched the photos, but we like them anyway. I think maybe all three were lighter, or just different, than shown. It was helpful that some of the other reviewers took their own photos, since those often showed true color. The built-in shorts under the skirt are nice too. The only negative is that the underwires come out easily in the wash, but leaving them out doesn't seem to affect how they work. The suits fit as expected if you look at the chart they provide and go by the US measurements. My size 4 teenage daughter was an extra large by the Asian sizing, but the chart showed us what to order.
summary: Modest and beautiful, but color not really as shown

reviewText:
Bought size 5X since I'm size 16. I could easily fit the swimsuit. The cups inside were very HARD size A cups. The shoulder  straps are too long and are non adjustable so the swimsuit cannot be pulled up to support the bust area. There is no built in breast support on the inside of the garment.

The swim suit looks exactly as pictured. It is very stylish, long, and also hides any stomach fat very very well. I have thick thighs so the swimsuit also did great covering the buttocks and upper thigh area well. The suit itself is very shape flattering but it is not well made for women who have breasts larger than a B cup.
summary: Great Swimsuit but not for C cups or larger.

I probably should've ordered my normal size. The item took longer than normal to arrive, but I expected that based on other reviews. The swimsuit is made out of a shiny black material.  The bust area is filled with super hard cups...not comfortable. To me, it was one of those that looks better on the hanger, then on the body. This suit is made for women with a larger chest size..  I think it would be a perfect fit then.

Great shirt!  I'm 6-1 and weigh 190.  Thin build.  I usually order an XL in shirt size, but after losing a little weight recently, I can squeeze into a large once in awhile.  They said this ran big, so I went with the Large.  Good decision!  Fits perfect.  This is not a "compression" fit.  It's looser fit, but it does "cling" a little.  Not too tight and not too loose.  Wide array of color choices to choose from.  Material is thin, very similar to rash guard and feels almost silky.  Very comfortable.  Dries quick.  I ordered 3 initially and ordered two more after my first order.  Great workout shirt and I plan to wear it on HOT days and working out.  I think it'll be a great shirt for canoeing.

Frankly, there is nothing I would change.  If forced to suggest a change, I would offer more logos.  The shirt itself is wonderful at a price that is much cheaper than the competition.  It arrived on time, but the shipping was a bit slow.

I'm in Canada, so buying at US price costs me about 33% more right now, but I found well worth the extra money when u compare to Gap lesser but nice quality and ouch price tag.

I have to admit, I read some of the other reviews with a grain of salt, as I really didn't expect these dresses to live up to the raves I saw, at least not at this price point. But I was SO pleasantly surprised to have been wrong! This dress is really beautiful and quite well made. All the seams were finished on mine, no loose threads, and the top portion was lined. (I always wear a slip when I wear a dress, so I don't worry about them being fully lined, and this one is not.) I purchased the "Light Orange" and it is just that - a light, pleasant not-quite-coral-orange shade that will be wonderful for both spring and summer (I already wore it paired with some royal  blue accessories and was told repeatedly I looked like a beautiful spring day). Paired with brown it would probably also be lovely for autumn. I've already ordered another color, I liked it that much. It fits perfectly allover and is quite slimming. If you do not have a large bust (at least a D), I could see that part not looking as intended, but for full-figured ladies, this dress is an absolute knockout.

reviewText: I can not say how much I love this dress! I am definitely a curvy girl and always worry about any clothing purchases online. That being said I needed a dress for a casual wedding and knew I wouldn't find anything in the stores near me, so I hoped and prayed and hit the order button. It arrived on time and in great condition. As soon as I could rip the packaging open I tried it on and held my breath. I was shocked at how well it fit my body! And I didn't want to hurl while looking at my reflection in the mirror! It fit my curves well and I loved the color on me. I normally wear a woman's size 16-18 in jeans, XL t-shirts, and 40DD bra and ordered the XXL orange version of this dress. (For those who were curious about sizing) Will definitely be ordering more in the other colors.
summary: So happy to have finally found a dress I love!

reviewText: Cut is completely wrong for that size #

My OCD nearly drove me insane searching for a dress. I am breathing, and smiling. I am very large up top, and have gained a LOT of weight, I was very very nervous that this dress would NOT fit, as I have never had great luck ordering clothes online before.  This is for a Bridesmaid dress.  I was looking for something I could wear in a Church wedding, wear a bra, below the knee, and definitely NOT have cleavage hanging out.  Not to mention "color" issues.  I was looking for a peach/coral.  There really aren't a lot of choices that fit those requirements under $250.  I was so nervous about trying this out.  I worried for nothing.  The color although listed as "light orange" was really as close as I could have gotten it in the largest bridal store in person.  The coverage is perfect, and the big one, the size,  Not only did it go on and zip right up, the fabric has some give in it, almost like a spanx type quality, making the fabric not light and flimsy or stiff but flowing nicely and hugging in the right places yet forgiving in the other places.  I ordered it on a Tuesday night and it was here by Friday afternoon, and I live in the middle of nowhere,  and overnight or 2 day shipping is ALWAYS a joke, but not this time.  As with any formal,  it had to be hung  and steamed, and will look really cute with a petticoat.  I had read all the reviews so I expected some issues with the zipper, and possibly the sewing quality.  I do need to put a couple stitches around the zipper as it appears a couple stitches were dropped but the hems look ok so far.  So really surprised at the quality, coverage, fit,  color  and rocketship fast shipping of this dress factoring in the price it's a win win. If you have been researching and reading review after review just go ahead and hit click.  All the reviews say they have a great return policy, you can't beat the price, and they must use a time machine for shipping. Buy it, have a sip of wine and thank me later.

reviewText: I was a skeptical when I ordered these, since you never know what kind of quality you're going to get on these types of items... when I received them, I was stoked! I recommend the Neon Nightlife bow tie as well. The products go really well together.
summary: Awesome sleek outfit when paired with the light up bow tie!

reviewText:
I bought these glasses and the matching bow tie to wear out to a neon glow party at a club in Los Angeles. Let me tell you, this product is an amazing conversation starter. Any bit of my shyness seemed to go out the window for the night. I was approached by tons of people all night long complementing me. The attention I received seemed to amp up my ego and made me to let go of my fear to approach women. The women responded well - most wanted to take a photo with me. It's a really weird feeling having strangers wanting to take a photo with you. I felt like a celebrity for the night. Good times!

The glasses are well made and feature sort-of tinted lens on the inside and mirrored on the outside. The mirrored lens was cool - I could hide my eyes from others. There is a certain level of mysteriousness and style added when others cant see your eyes. I know it sounds ridiculous to wear sunglasses at night but the lens are cool. I was also able to easily pop out the lens and put them back in. The glasses come with a clear pouch to protect them and store them. The wire leading to the battery pack comes from the back of the frame behind the ear and is hidden well. I was able to completely hide the wire under my shirt except for the 6 inch area leading from my ear to the top of my shirt.  One of my friends with long hair was able to completely hide the wire with his hair when he wore them.

I stored the battery pack in my pants pocket. It makes a slight whining sound when on. When I turned it on at home in silence, I thought I was going to have to listen to it all night. But luckily once it is in your pocket you can barely hear it. Add the sounds at any public location is enough to make the high pitch tone completely unnoticeable.

Longevity is great. It lasted from about 8pm to 2am two nights in a row so far with no loss in brightness on a single set of batteries.

Overall, I would totally recommend this to anyone who likes attention and wants to stand out in the crowd.
summary: Light up glasses make for a fun filled night!

reviewText: These look great on you, but unfortunately you can't see s*** while you are wearing them at night, definitely get the ones with clear lenses since the glow effect is mostly lost during the day.

These glasses look absolutely phenomenal in low light. The construction of the frames is very solid, and the cord and battery pack feel robust and well-crafted. I searched Amazon for something just like this, and am glad I selected the more expensive option in these glasses, as it appears the level of quality trump similar offerings on here.
These look really cool. You mostly can't hear the buzzing sound it makes if you're in a loud club. But if you're just at a casual house party, be aware it makes a high pitched noise.
summary: These look really cool. You mostly can't hear the buzzing sound it ...

reviewText: Lov it
Quality was cheap. Light too brights couldn't see.

Bada** set of Wayfarer style light up glasses from the folks at Neon Nightlife. The lenses have a reflective finish on the front that really sets them off. I got the orange model and even in bright light you can tell they are flashing. The effect really comes into it's own as the ambient light comes down. Powered by a pair of "AA" batteries, the control pack attaches via a proprietary connector to the lead wire that merges into one of the frame arms. A single button on it's face controls it's functions: steady on/slow flash/fast flash and off. The frames are clear except for the EL treatment and are lightweight at 1.4 ounces. They are 5 1/4 inches across the front and will fit any size head even adult with no problem. Nicely gift packaged in a thick zip lock envelope, suitable for gift giving. You can definitely be the coolest cat at the next evening get together as none of your friends probably has a pair of shades like these. Super shades with smart engineering. Sample for fair review.

These are so much fun. I wore these to a friend's bachelorette party and they were definitely a conversation starter. They drew a lot of attention. They are comfortable to wear and didn't both my ears at all. The only downside is the cord. The cord was annoying but other than that they worked. They are tinted and have a mirror reflection in the lenses. There are 3 different settings on the glasses. There is just solid, slow blink or fast blinking. I will be honest though, if you get seizures or anything to that nature, do not make them blink fast and you will see why in the video I have attached. I wore them on the solid setting as the blinking ended up bothering my eyes. They also make a whistling sound when it's turned on, just like a neon sign would. There were quite a few people at the party I wore them to that kept trying to borrow them. These glasses saw a lot of people that night. They are a blast and draw attention. I walked onto the dance floor with these on and everyone stared at me and it was awesome. These are fun for if you are going to go to a club, party, rave or even just a night out with the girls. They add fun to the mix which is always great. I really do love these glasses because they are different and fun. I do plan on wearing them to other places. I am curious to see how long the batteries last. I had them turned on for 6 straight hours and the batteries didn't die. That's a plus as items like these tend to suck battery life. The cord is easy enough to conceal as well. You can wear it under your clothes and the battery pack has a clip on it so you can clip it to your pants if you want to. I personally wore the cord down my back and clipped it to my pants. All in all, these are a lot of fun and you won't regret the purchase. I received these Neon Nightlife glasses at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Fun glasses are a definite conversation starter.

reviewText: Fit my nephew perfectly. Quality material
Sleeves seem small in proportion to rest of shirt.

The shirt was very well packaged.  Like a designer, adult men's shirt. The material is very see through, like a thin linen.  It is fitted through the torso.  It was too small for my huskier 10 year old, who normally wears a size 10 (U.S. sizes) just fine.  I bought a size 12 thinking I wanted it a bit loose in case he wore an undershirt.  It buttoned but barely.  However, my very slender 13 year old was able to wear it, even though he has incredibly long arms (most sleeves are too short for him).  He generally wears a size 14, just so the sleeves are long enough.  This shirt fit him perfectly.  So for that reason, I kept it, even though it's very thin, linen like texture. The tie has an elastic band for around the neck and is long enough, not too short like some.  The pocket hanky has a weird blanket stitch finishing on the edge, poorly made.  The color is a beautiful, vibrant blue.  The thing I liked best about this shirt was the packaging.  Although there was a lot of it, to the point of overkill.  There were three different wraps for around the collar.  The cardboard the shirt was wrapped around, a plastic collar stay, plastic on the tie, four straight pins and 6 to 8 metal twist clips holding the whole thing together, as well as a plastic outer wrap (though ours came ripped open the shirt was clean).  The thing I liked the least and the reason I am giving it three stars is the super thin, material.  Although it is literally see through if the person stands in sunlight, it is rough textured like muslin and stiff like muslin.
summary: See through material.  Overkill on the packaging.
