Initially was pretty happy with this item. Within the 1st few days, noticed the lining started to pull away at the seams. Within a week, it was a mess.
Never put anything more than a phone or a wallet inside, so I knew it wasn't misuse.
The lining just came undone, making ALL the compartments into just one shredded, stringy mess. Because of all the garbage that used to be the lining, closing the zippers became impossible without getting it jambed up with all the strings & shreads getting caught.
Too bad this turned out to be worthless, unusable & an unsightly mess. The size was perfect & the design functional.
But the manufacturing & end result is disgraceful, substandard & an insult to consumers.
I would have returned this sorry excuse for a bag, but since it took WEEKS to get to me & DAYS to fall apart, I'd decided I wasn't going to let this fiasco take any more of my time or patience. I wrote this one off & will be extra diligent when ordering from Amazon. Sadly, found myself staying away from Amazon & only shopping on the site when it's my last option.
summary: Fell apart in less than a week. Order something else from another vendor

I purchased the bag as an alternative to my small backpack purses on my upcoming trip to England because i am visually impaired, and use a tactile cane in unfamiliar locations which makes it difficult to take a backpack on and off often. The bag will be good for what i need it for. it is able to fit my kindle fire 8, a journal, sunblock, and my keys, but i will not be able to be the most prepared person with the magic bag of everything that we might need on this trip. overall a very good bag just a little small.

I bought 2, I'm looking for an excuse to buy a 3rd.  I have an epileptic dog and her meds - including syringes - have to go EVERYWHERE with her, including walks.  I needed something small, relatively waterproof, lightweight that can be worn crossbody so I have both hands free.  And it had to have compartments because in an emergency, I can't be hunting around for a syringe, it has to have its place and it has to be there NOW.  This is absolutely perfect, it's her little kit.  The 2nd one  I got is for me.  You know how no matter how big your purse is, it's never big enough to hold everything?  Yeah, the thing weighed more than I do.  I needed something to discipline me - wallet, phone, keys, smokes, done, out the door.  And a few pockets left over if I absolutely need something.  Best $9-10 bucks I ever spent.  So, I've got the green and the khaki, that grey one is really nice.  I'm sure I'll think of something.
EDIT:  Well, instead of buying a 3rd version of this, I decided to get the messenger bag for $5 more - it will hold paperwork I have to carry around sometimes.

reviewText: Very strong bag. Great quality. Looks great!
Gifted to a friend, he liked it

I have been using this duffel bag from Baosha as an emergency first aid bag for the last month and I am quite impressed with it.

My thoughts about the duffel bag:

01 Well Made - The duffel bag is durable and well made. There is a lot of stitching on this bag and all of it is tight and free of loose threads. The straps are firmly attached to the bag and the snaps and zippers all work as they should. I expect this duffel bag will hold up for a long time.

02 A Good Amount of Space - I am using this duffel bag as my emergency first aid bag and there is plenty of room on the inside for my stuff. Inside the duffel bag I keep my first aid kit, a warm blanket, a flashlight, batteries, paracord, a bag of cotton balls, and bottles of hydrogen peroxide, hand sanitizer, and saline.

There is also a zippered pocket and four zipperless pockets inside of the bag. Two of the zipperless pockets are large enough for phones and other two are suitable for pens and pencils.

On the outside of the duffel bag is a zippered pocket that is large enough for a wallet and keys. There are also a hand sized pockets on each side of the duffel bag that are kept securely shut with snaps.

03 Stylish and Attractive - The duffel bag is made of PU leather but I think it has the look of real leather. Under close inspection, leather aficionados could probably tell it is not real leather but it is still an attractive duffel bag.

04 Odor Free - I was relieved to find this bag is free of the nasty chemical odor that seems to plague cheaper products made of PU leather. This is a huge plus to me and I imagine this would be a plus for anyone that isn't hard of smelling.

05 Versatile - I like having the option to either carry the bag by the handles or use the included strap and sling it over my shoulder.

06 Unisex - The look of this duffel bag may be geared towards men but it is also suitable for women.

I received this duffel bag free for testing and review.

reviewText:
This purse is a very pleasant surprise.  I am really, REALLY picky about what I carry for many reasons:

One, I need a very versatile bag.  I do not like changing bags out depending on the color outfit I'm wearing but I also hate to have a clashing purse.  This bag has a nice muted black on the bottom, a nice neutral brown, an olive, a khaki, a neutral burgundy and a neutral blue.  All of the colors are nice earth tones.  The versatility is also a factor in the style it presents as a bag.  I prefer a cross body strap, but at times it is more practical to have an off- the- shoulder strap and at other times, such as when I travel on a plane, a back pack style is preferable.  All of these forms are possible with this bag. (It should be mentioned too that the silver handles on top for a hand-carried bag are of nice quality, if that's the form of carriage you would prefer. I don't usually need to have this option but so long as it is there, it is a very big plus that the silver handles look nice on the bag anyhow!)

Two, I need space for more than a wallet and a phone, but I really need the bag itself to be light, since the stuff I carry in my purse tends to present enough weight in and of itself.  The canvas texture on the outside and the durable cotton lining make for a durable piece without unnecessary additional weight.  The leather straps on the sides and on the bottom (placed there for the purpose of changing the position of the straps from cross- body to back pack to over- the- shoulder are of decent quality.  I expect them to last through some good wear and tear.  The main strap is fully adjustable and a good, wide, stiff canvas military belt- style material.

Three, I love quality items but rarely- if ever- pay full price.  The MSRP on the tag is $109.00, so the list price (currently under $20 at the time of posting this review) is a super stretch- my- dollar deal.  The bottom of the bag is slightly stiff, which I see as a good sign of quality on a soft- shell bag as it does find itself on the floor from time to time.  The enclosed tag also promises a twelve month warranty for rebate or replacement.  I see this also as a sign of quality as any manufacturer backing its item with a respectable warranty indicates their confidence in the product.

Fourth, I need an outside pocket for my large phone.  I am very pleased to find that the front zipper pocket is large enough to fit my iPhone 6 Plus without struggling to get it in and out; and now I don't need to struggle with finding my phone at the bottom of my purse!  Having that pocket helps keep the phone in good shape as well because it's not rubbing against other items in the purse.  Win!

A word about the inside of the purse: it IS deep.  I keep mine organized by keeping items of like kind in separate mesh bags with a zipper (makeup in one, tissues in one, pens and medicine in another, etc.) so I'm now able to avoid the incessant "digging to the bottom of the Abyss" problem I've had with deep purses before.  I also have to be aware that I have the tendency to carry WAY more stuff with a larger purse, so that's a consideration if you're like me in that respect.

All in all I am quite pleased with my new find.  I have a lot of confidence in a long- term relationship with this bag! ;-)

reviewText:
Upon opening up the packaging for this bag, I was impressed with the quality of the canvas material. The colors in the picture reflect how it looks in real life. Th silver handles are really unique. I like how this bag can be worn as a shoulder bag, cross-body, or a backpack. The zipper pulls are high quality and sturdy. The zippers zip open easily. The leather-like accents look realistic and all the hardware to hook the strap to different parts of the bag are shiny and attractive. On the sides There are leather straps that hang down and a buckle at the bottom so that you can create a slouchy style. The strap does not extend all the way to the buckle unless the bag is scrunched up a bit. The lovely silver handles were wrapped in plastic to prevent scratches, however, it was difficult to get the plastic off the handles where the handles go inside the leather holder. I can't get all the plastic off, but managed to cut it away enough that it is not noticeable. Also, on the strap there are a few loose threads and a discoloration, however, these imperfections do not detract from the sturdiness of the bag.

The bag itself is 15 inches tall to the highest point and 14 inches wide. In terms of depth, it is flat. However, it can hold tons of items. There is one pocket on the back that is about 4.5in tall x 5.5in wide. On the inside, there are two open pockets, one 4in x 4in and the other also 4in x 4in but with extra fabric that could allow something thicker to be slipped in. There is also a single zip pocket on the inside that is 4in tall x 7in wide. The strap can be extended to 61in, not including the hooks and shortened to 32in not including the hooks.

Overall, I am very pleased with the quality of this bag. It is very sturdy with thick canvas material and solid hardware. The colors are beautiful, it is extremely stylish, and it's great for holding a bunch of stuff. The few faults I did find did not take away from all the positives.

reviewText:
Out of all the charm bracelets, I would recommend Pandora. It's the best quality and has the most security for your charms. Each charm of Pandora, screws onto the bracelet. This helps make sure that if you're bracelet falls off, you won't have all your bead fall off as well. The bracelet also includes four places to put clasps, which add more security to your bracelet as well. I know it's weird to talk about security with your bracelet, but when you pay $40-$80 on a single charm, you want to make sure nothing gets lost.

I love the added charm of the heart enclosure. I have had the regular Pandora bracelet, but it was lost and I ended up replacing it with this one. The heart enclosure looks like you have another charm on your bracelet and I found it easier to close than the regular style enclosure.

I would highly, highly recommend this bracelet!

reviewerName: it's all gone to the dogs
reviewText:
So I bought this belt since I fluctuate in waist size like most other folks and preset holes in belts just weren't cutting it for comfort. I saw this on sale and gave it a shot. The mechanism works great, and the cut to fit was simple and left no visible evidence. The box it came in is really nice, and would make this belt a perfect unwrapped gift. However, I think that's where the problem lies. They could have shipped the belt in a boring box and used slightly higher quality material on the belt.

The stitching is fraying and the "leather?" is separating in some spots on my belt. I probably wear the belt 2-3 times a week since ownership. The buckle looks just as good as the day I got it, and the ratcheting system still functions perfectly. So I'll wear this thing until it completely falls apart, I just can't wear it with business attire where the belt isn't covered by a shirt.

So would I buy another one? Yeah, but only during a great sale. Would I give this as a gift to someone? Probably.

*UPDATE* 11-23-2016
Marino contacted me and offered to send me a replacement belt. I'm changing my review from 3 to 4 stars because I would have reviewed it as a 3.5 initially. They get a .5 boost for outstanding customer service. I'll come back to this review in a few months and adjust the review again if warranted (in either direction, as if the replacement belt doesn't fray in a few months it's definitely a 5 star item with the customer service)
summary: I wanted to love this, but after a few months it's starting to fall apart *update at bottom of review*

This eye mask is a must for any day-sleeper or frequent flyer.
-It is the softest eye mask I've ever used--feels like a pair of pajamas.  Very comfortable and high quality.
-No chemical smell, and it didn't irritate my face or leave my skin flaky (I have sensitive skin, especially on my forehead).
-The strap is adjustable with Velcro so you can size it to fit your head, which is helpful if you're a lady with thick hair like I am.
-I wore it with the strap over my hair, and it didn't leave much of that telltale "bump" in my hair like less expensive masks do.
-This would be a great gift for a nurse, anyone who works the night shift, or a frequent traveler.
-I agree with another reviewer that for those with large heads and/or a lot of hair, some additional velcro would be helpful.  However, the velcro does appear to adhere to the fabric as well, so this really wan't an issue for me.
-I love the gray color, as it won't show dirt or wear, which we all know is inevitable when traveling and sleeping!
-I did receive a discount on this sleep eye mask in exchange for a review; however, my views are my own and I'm not at all required to give a high rating.
summary: A MUST for day sleepers and frequent flyers

Just received this little gem.  I wanted to remove my flexible metal watch band so that I could clean it in my ultrasonic device.

It took me well over an hour plus some penetrating oil but I got it off and cleaned.

The reason for the oil and the length of time was that one of the spring loaded pins that connects the band to the watch had become frozen due to the dirt build up inside the pin assembly and would not budge.  I was applying so much force to this little tool I really expected it to bend and/or break.  It didn't.

As a note to anyone else, think about getting a set of new pins (measure the old ones; they are all different) prior to removal.  Definitely a time and aggravation saver.

This set is super!  I originally bought this for my iPhone, iPad, iPod- you get the jist. reviewText:
I have been a watch hobbyist for decades.  I do a lot of band sizings and replacements, battery changes, and minor repairs for myself and many friends.  I have accumulated a nice set of higher quality watch tools over the years, but when somebody asks me to come over and change a bunch of watch batteries for them, it's nice to have a small, easily portable, self contained kit that contains everything I'm likely to need.

The case back openers are the key to kits like this.  There are two basic ways watch backs come off.  They may be pry off backs, or they may be unscrew backs.  The screw back case opener in this kit is easy to adjust and work with.  The pry tool is just OK.  I actually prefer a pry tool made by Victorinox.  This is marketed under the Victorinox name and several other brand names.  I highly recommend obtaining one of those to supplement this kit.

Another essential supplementary item is a head mounted magnifier.  This will allow better vision for working on small or tiny things, and you will keep both hands free.

The rest of the included tools are good quality and are perfectly serviceable.  The case is zipper closure and i really nice.
summary: Really nice kit for basic watch repairs.

reviewText: This is a very beautiful dual heart shaped necklace. Whenever I see hearts I think of my mother, she loves hearts, all different colors laced in diamonds or solid with colors. As soon as this arrived I knew it was going to be hers, it has her style and name all over it. It arrived secure in it's white, trim in gold gift box. The silver hearts accented in diamond like stones are just the added touch. The silver heart shaped pendant is absolutely gorgeous, the smaller heart lays perfectly inside the bigger heart and the chain goes thru an opening the curve of the heart and is slide-able. There are the words " Love you Forever" engraved on the outside of the smaller heart. The chain length is about 17 inches,  just right not to long and not to short. The heart shape pendant lays flat against your chest. The chain is light weight and does pull on your neck and hair line. The clasp is strong, durable and has a extension to shorten or make use of it's entire length. The links are small dainty, looks really nice, it can be worn to a formal or as everyday casual wear. I would recommend this Engraved White Gold Plated Dual Heart Pendant Necklace!! I received this product for free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

This heart necklace is a nice, classy looking piece of jewelry.  It comes packed in a white gift box.  The smaller silver heart is engraved with the words "Love you forever" on the outside, so it is hidden until you pull it out from the bigger heart.  The bigger heart has two rows of the Swarovski crystals all the way around it.  The chain is a lighter weight chain, but with the weight of the pendant it lays nicely.  The chain is about 17-1/2".  There is a drop chain where the necklace ends meet, with a tiny heart shaped pendant on it.  You could also use this drop chain to make the necklace longer.  The crystals are clear and pick up the reflection of lights well.  This necklace looks similar to more expensive necklaces I have seen advertised by jewelers.

I have received this item free in exchange for providing my honest, unbiased feedback.  All opinions are my own, as I have not been compensated and I never guarantee a good review.
summary: This necklace looks classy and timeless

reviewText:
This is my new everyday piece of jewelry! This necklace is so well made and very versitile.

The chain is very thin and feels a little dainty on my neck but I believe this makes the piece really beautiful becuase the chain does not take away from the beautiful design of the accent slide attached. The clasp is very sturdy and latches very tightly and hold very well unlike some other necklaces that the spring goes out the first time you wear it.

The slide on this piece is one of the most unique pieces I have ever seen. The inside heart has a beautiful saying that says I love you forever. This makes it a special gift for that special someone. The outside heart has a row of .super crisp and clear Swarovski crystal elements that really accent the piece in the most beautiful way. I also love the way that the hearts connect to the chain. There is no flimsy latch to hold the hearts on it is actually holes in the side of the heart that connect the heart to the chain.

Overall this piece has been my absolute favorite piece to date and I am so glad I was able to try this necklace at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

First of all, you shouldn't use these if you'll be sweating at all. They are not wicking at all, so the sweat pools up. I went for a run in these today and when I was done it looked like I had peed myself from the sweat pooling up where the thighs touch.

Also, when I took them off, my legs were full of black fuzzies from the leggings. They were also all over my arms and on my face from when I wiped my sweat while running. Not pretty.

All in all, these are useless for what I wanted them for, but I'm sure they would be great for doing yoga or some light weightlifting.

reviewText: Good purchase

Yes, the socks are cute and the anti-skid will help with little feet but they are
1) way too big for infants.
2) look like they were sewn by a child (see pictures). The stitching is jagged around the foot hole. Instead of sewing the foot hole to the sock, they took a strip of cloth and crossed the it on top in a mismatched circle. The stitching is sloppily crossed on top of each other. The purple sock doesn't even have thread that is purple.

Additionally, my yellow sock has a stain on it (circled in picture). I was going to give these as a gift but I am to embarrassed, as they look like they came from a dollar store. When you pay $12 for 5 pairs of socks you expect to get nice socks. Carters or Gerber socks can be purchased in 6 packs for less and are cute and made correctly. I don't know how all these reviews say they are so wonderful. I'm guessing they overlook the stitching, they are paid reviewers, or I got a defective set. Don't waste your money on these.

They appear to be good quality, a bit cheesy looking, but now I have to put them away somewhere to wait for them to fit her, I'm going to guess at least 2 years from now. Hopefully I'll remember they exist when she can actually wear them. I saw someone else say they were perfect for their 9 month old walking baby-- I'd like to meet that baby, it would be quite a baby!

Good colors otherwise. They are individually wrapped as well which is wasteful packaging wise.

We're putting them on over other socks as a second layer during the winter (we have cold hardwood floors) and they're perfect.

They stayed on ALL DAY without falling off and kept the other socks on too. Don't know why no one else makes these but they should! Only thing I would improve is the quality of the material, it's not bad, it's just not as impressive as the other aspects of these socks.

My sister is a Christian and I left the faith many years ago. I've been viewed with disdain as I now practice yoga and trantra. I bought these for her as a Christmas gift. She absolutely loved them and put them on immediately. She inquired to the number of beads and their representation and I explained that they are simply used to count. Whether it's the breath or a prayer. She seemed satisfied and now often wears a piece of the Yoga heritage. This also helped her to begin to see the beauty of the Hindu/Yoga heritage and she has since asked me many questions because of all the people that recognize the importance of her mala. The people that are drawn into her life because of this mala have all been warm hearted and of good intention. Her perception of me and my affinity towards yoga has begun to shift.
summary: the lotus beads add a flair of authenticity and with weightiness of it makes if feel like something rooted in an earthly vibrati

reviewText: Very nice quality material! Not cheap, flimsy or see through.

I got this bag in khaki, and the color is true to the product images. It feels durable and solidly constructed, with strong stitching and tough canvas material. It has several pockets in the large main compartment to break up the space, and two front pockets for holding smaller items. The side pockets are a bit small, but would be able to hold skinny, smaller water bottles.

The points where the straps attach to the bag are the weak point of any backpack, in my experience. This backpacks straps are securely attached to the rest of the bag, and feel like they aren't going anywhere. Both the shoulder straps and the back of the bag have a thin amount of cushioning in them to protect from strain and books poking into the back.

This is a well constructed, classically designed backpack with a simple, attractive style, and I recommend it.

Product sample provided for evaluation and reviewing purposes.

I had also bought her a new rainbow colored leotard with a long rainbow tutu and wings with sparkles that made up the whole set. Now she insists that she must wear the necklace to dance. I got her a jewelry box that plays Swan Lake, so she gets dressed, puts on her necklace, winds up the jewelry box, and starts dancing around the room saying I am the ballerina that dances from cloud to cloud over the rainbows restoring the power to the fairies all over the world. She's our little drama queen, but who knows she may become a star. The pendant was beautiful with no flaws and the chain was superb, it was a little too much for a 5 year old but they had lost everything they owned in an accident and I don't have my own kids so their mom said they needed clothes cause everyone else did toys and she knows I have good taste for her 5 year old and 13 year old so I'm great at online shopping and they got 20 outfits each, jewelry boxes with jewelry and some toys for the little one and surprises mom had said no to the older one cause she knew I had them. It was a great Christmas and she takes this necklace out every day to dance!

The arms and torso fit him on the large/baggy side while the legs were way too short even on his stubby little legs.  The crotch kept popping open whenever he sat down or stood up or crawled or walked...so basically it was open all the time.  I even took his diaper off and STILL the darn thing kept popping open!  Since I waited until the last minute to order something for his bday photo shoot, I was stuck with this thing.  His popped open crotch ruined a lot of really cute shots and was tolerable, at best, in several others.  I don't see how this could work for any child out there that is proportioned normally or with long legs.  I would have returned it if I had time to find something else.

reviewText: My two children like it very much. It is not the same as other products. It is very breathable!

You can use the case to charge but also if you don't want to bother with the case you can charge one or both by plugging this one cord into each of the pods in the narrow area.
they were perfect.quality is good, straps are solid and has some nice detailing on the plastic so it isn't plain.

The charging case is a good thing to have, it carries them around safely without breaking them. The unit is very easy to be charged, I just connect my micro USB cable to the box and put the headphone inside, it will charge it quickly. with different lights on when charging and when it's done charging.it is fairly easy to wear, I use only one headphone each time, so I have doubled play time and use the 2nd one as a backup.

These bluetooth earbuds work pretty well. I like that you can use either both earbuds or one at a time. I also like that you can charge them in the storage case or externally with the included usb cable.

we've also been itching to finally review this Spriggan Requiem. It's a balance-type Bey and the official partner of Shu! Like Legend Spriggan, Spriggan Requiem can spin both left AND right. It can change in between battles the exact same way by rotating the teeth on the back of the layer. Not only does the 0 disk weigh quite a bit more than your average one, the Zeta Driver can also change between 3 different modes. This Spriggan is extremely versatile and you'll be able to mix up your play style/performance very easily!
summary: Collars Are the Way to Go

summary: Small ones do not hold. On most I had ...

reviewText: This is a nice set of fine sized screwdrivers and other tools. While they are advertised for watch repair, they could easily be repurposed for notebook computers, tablets, and other small electronic devices. They are clearly stainless, and since you shouldn't be putting any heavy duty pressure on them, should last. I'm happy to have a set. I won't need to use them often, but when I DO need them, they'll be extremely useful. I received a set to review.
summary: Nice set of fine work tools

reviewText: This is a great set. I used it to remove some links.

Considering the price, this set is a nice deal. The screwdrivers are not "top shelf" quality, but they aren't junk either. They work if you don't push them too hard (i.e., apply too much force), and since they are designed for delicate work, they shouldn't be a problem under normal circumstances. Some of the blades were loose, but once I tightened the holding screw, all was fine. The rotating stand is a nice extra. All in all, it's a great deal compared to $100-$200 for similar sets from the more professional brands. As a hobbyist (not someone making a living working with watches), these are perfect. If I were a pro, I'm sure I would spend the money on the better brands, but otherwise, these will work great.
summary: Not pro-level, but considering the price, these screwdrivers are a good deal.

reviewText: The interchangeable blades seem like a great idea. Unfortunately, the screws don't tighten down all the way and when you attempt to use the screwdriver it just spins around in the handle. It was suggested that I didn't have the mounting screw tight enough, I got a solid mount screwdriver to tighten but it was not possible to get it any tighter. My next problem may not be the fault of the tool, but on one of the watches I needed to fix none of the blades was thin enough to get into the slot. This could just be the watch manufacturer's fault.

I feel something in the back pocket and figure it must be the tags that were nowhere to be found.  Nope, it was four $1 bills.  A few things could have happened. 1: Someone at Volcom was handing out presents, 2: someone at amazon was handing out presents, 3: someone wore these shorts out, got drunk, wedged $4 in the pocket forgot about and decided they didn't like the shorts and sent them back. reviewText:
I am so disappointed in this dress. I bought another Beachcoco dress like this earlier in pregnancy that has a patterned skirt, and I love the way it feels BUT the bust area is entirely too small, so I mostly wear it around the house with no bra. I bought this dress thinking I would order a size up to get a better fit, and it would be great for wearing home from the hospital when baby is born in July. The large is only slightly bigger than the medium, and the bust was still too small AND it is so short! I washed and dried it once (just like I do with the other dress weekly) and it comes down to my ankles. The patterned dress still drags the floor and is the perfect length. Needless the say I'm disappointed in the inconsistency of this company and the super small chest area, which makes no sense for expecting mothers with growing breasts!

In conclusion, this dress did not live up to my expectations, but I will still use it to wear home from the hospital with my newborn because, well, I bought it and washed it. I've been tying a knot in the bottom on the side to add a cute detail and cover up the fact that it's too short.
summary: Why so short??? Get it together Beachcoco!

reviewText: Returning.  I knew this wouldn't be a high quality dress but the fabric was thin and highlighted any added weight from the pregnancy.  I was hoping this would be my shower dress but definitely not.

The fabric is knit and is really stretchy. So, it fit me just fine.

It is also very long. It will go down to your ankles.

I don't like that it shows my belly button, but a slip underneath helps a lot.
Returning as did not fit as expected

The dress is not maternity. It fit in the body (though wouldn't later in pregnancy) but WAY too small in the chest. I am busty but not abnormal for the XL I ordered, and have no problems with other maternity dresses in XL I have ordered. This is too small in the chest for someone not pregnant, let alone a pregnant woman with an expanding chest. This dress is way too inappropriate for a pregnant woman or any woman.

I'm also 5'8 so the dress does not go as long as I would like, it reaches my ankles. It's very comfortable! I may buy another color unless I can find something longer.

Also, someone commented about the smell. You should always wash items when you buy them from anywhere, and the smell went away with the first wash.
summary: Perfect for preggo mama's in hot days!

It feels good, looks awesome, the price is good, and I'd highly recommend it

reviewText: Love this coat for my recent trip to NYC. You can use it for formal events with a suit underneath or for casual walks around NYC. The material is thick enough for winter weather. This coat looks like it will still be wearable in early Spring or late Fall with a single layer underneath. Since it doesn't have a lapel, you might want to pair it with a scarf. I'm 5' 10", 160lb with an athletic build. I usually buy slim fit shirts and the US medium size was a perfect fit.

It's a stranger design than I was expecting. It buttons very low so it looks great with a shirt and tie. Any other clothing the style doesn't really match. I'm 5'9 175 and a medium fit me perfectly. Athletic build.  Satisfied but not thrilled.

I ordered this for my 14yo for homecoming. We took measurements and used the size chart. She is 5'4, 125lbs and wears a size 3 jeans. Chart said size 6 so that's what we ordered. The fit is pretty good, the chest is a bit large for her, she is a B cup, but it's padded and shaped enough that it works. The length is good, just above the knee but not too short, appropriate for young teen and school dances. Material is good quality, color is nice but the rhinestones are a disaster. Right upon opening the dress up I saw multiple stones missing from the front chest and they weren't even in the packaging to sew back on. They are loosely sewn on with a very fine plastic thread and all in one run with no ties so if the thread breaks at all between beads it just unravels and they all start to fall off. When we carefully tried the dress on stones were falling off the sheer chest material and the bottom. I spent over 3 hours carefully sewing many many stones back on and trying to move some to even out the front where they were missing and we had no replacements. The snaps at the neckline are very cheap and sewn on. One fell off when trying to unsnap it and had to be sewn back on as well. Overall the dress is beautiful and my daughter loves it (now that I've fixed it) but for the price I was very disappointed with the beadwork and to have it just falling off like it did. Definitely not worth the price. Had I not fixed it myself it would have cost even more to have someone else fix it or we would have had even more stones falling off and the dress would be ruined. Next time we'll likely find a dress in person so we can inspect the quality.
Dress fits perfect. Beautiful. My daughter loves it!

reviewText:
Opaque, flattering, forgiving.

Other reviewers are right about the details making this cover up special - the beads and the little band on the back make this cover-up special, and the material is opaque (in black), soft, and not that cheap polyester feel of so many beach cover ups.

Sizing: I ordered the medium, and I'm 5'2" and short-waisted with postpartum figure woes. The dress fell to mid-thigh (so taller women be warned), didn't cling too tightly to anything, and managed to look flattering. I had my doubts about the drawstring waist, but I was really surprised by the flattering fit. This really looks like a cute dress.

I could wear this to a casual beach dinner or run around the resort after the pool without being self-conscious about wearing a skimpy beach cover-up in my not-so-fit figure. Highly recommend you give this one a try.

It's unlikely you'll find a better value on this style of strap and buckle. The leather is the expected assolutamente calf leather with a soft, almost suede-like feel. Based on my MacBook's display, the color is nearly spot-on with the image in the product description, but due to the leather's characteristics it will develop a patina and gradually darken over time due to the leather's texture. The buckle is solid stainless steel with a lightly brushed texture for a matte appearance. Like the buckle, the tab is also solid, not rolled or stamped steel and the whole assembly is attached to the strap with a threaded steel pin as opposed to a springbar.

The holes are very well defined and accommodate the wide pin with no unnecessary force during adjustment unlike other brands. Stitching is straight and even, very well done, especially for the price with all edges of the leather finished evenly and with no separation. The retaining loops for the strap end are also equally heavy duty and should hold up over time. The looped ends for attachment for the watch are well done. They're not reinforced internally but are almost exactly 24mm wide and should accommodate up to a 2.4mm springbar with no issues. Finally, the padding is well done, giving the strap a third dimension but tapering gently toward the pin holes to make putting on and taking off your watch an easy affair.

If you plan to wear this with a cheap watch, it will elevate the overall look. on a more expensive watch, it will blend in nicely and maintain a luxury appearance. This band is only cheap in price as the appearance and build quality are well above what you'll pay for it. It easily equals the quality of other leather bands I've paid over $150 for. In fact, there's a brand in the US well known on Kickstarter, that shall remain unnamed, that sells this exact band for $150 as being for the Apple Watch.
summary: The best $20 leather watch strap you'll find

Mine did come with pins.  Seems others did not, I'm very happy it did as I broke one, since I am ham fisted.

One complaint:  The pins are tiny compared to the holes in the straps.  They rattled and felt cheap.  I have no idea if better (larger) pins are available, but I did manage to make sleeves out of those tubes on an aerosol can (think WD-40).  It was a tight fight all the way around but they no longer rattle.

Hopefully this strap lasts!

It is an oil based finish that has a smooth slightly aged texture. It will get a deeper patina with use and oils from wearing. the stitching is medium thread and just right for the style. The tang buckle is thicker (and much nicer) than the typical stamped pieces in this price range. I will be removing it to use a deployant. This strap did not come with tubes, but it did come with pins. The pins it came with are on the thin side. I would guess about .8 - 1mm. The thickness of the strap I received is about 5.5mm at the lug and 3mm at the tip.
The sides and back of the strap are finished nicely and the quality and appearance of this strap far exceeds the price.

reviewText:
I purchased this band for use with an Apple Watch (using adapters also purchased on Amazon). I've been wearing it for a few days and, so far, I love it.

A few notes:

-My wrist is a little large (I'm 6' 2" and a big frame) and it was almost too small for me (2 remaining holes in the band), so the band doesn't quite reach to the second loop. (I may end up removing the second keeper loop.) I'd buy a slightly larger one if such were available.
-The leather is a bit stiff when it arrives, but nothing that was problematic for putting it on. Three days end and it's starting to feel softer already.
-Stitching seems good to my eye and think it adds to the look of the band.
-The buckle may be large for some. I actually like the size of it on me, but it might look too large on a smaller wrist. It feels a little thin and thus far is my only concern with the band (not a big concern, but I am keeping an eye on it).

I'll include some pictures to show what the buckle looks like when worn, as well as a close up of the stitching, etc.

Overall, this seems well worth the price (both far cheaper and nicer looking than Apple's leather bands). I will update the review if I encounter any issues.

reviewText:
This was a disaster.

1.  Poor quality.  Scratchy/Rough.
2.  Incredibly small.  RUNS VERY SMALL.
3.  Spent 2 hours trying to get it on -- WITH help from two other people.  Impossible.

Returning.

This is not one size fits all. They have to know this.
Firstly, the sleeves are tight, so you cannot pull it up far enough to be comfortable. You walk around looking like a t-rex. The sleeve part is a different knit than the "body" there is not much stretch there.

Secondly, in the photo, it drapes nicely. It does not in the real world. It is not wide enough to drape like that; roughly 16 1/2 inches wide. Even worn off the shoulders it is just not wide enough. This is not designed for an adult,American woman, of average size, to wear.

The body of the knit is soft and stretchy and I like the shade of grey, but the edging is uneven and I wonder how long it would hold up after washing and wearing it a few times. That will never be an issue for me, because I will be returning it.

reviewText: Too small am sending back

This is a really nice, quality canvas belt.  It's thick and heavy, but not so heavy that it's uncomfortable.  It came beautifully packaged in a hinged tin box which makes it the most perfect pre-packaged gift!  I could tell as soon as I felt the belt that it will last a long time.  The canvas, leather and belt buckle appear to be very high quality, durable and well made.  And the brown woven canvas with specks of white mixed in, creates the perfect neutral color that matches almost anything.  My husband loves this belt!

As far as fit goes, my husband typically wears a size 36w pant (sometimes a 38 depending on how they run).  I had ordered a 38" belt because I was told you should order the next size up from the usual pant size.  Unfortunately, the 38" belt was entirely too small for my husband.  So I would have to say this belt runs a bit small.  I ended up replacing it with the 42" belt (a 40" was not available) and the 42" fits perfectly with room to spare.  He wears it on the second hole in so he has plenty of leeway.  The 40" probably would have been perfect.  This is a really nice looking everyday belt and I would definitely recommend it.  Just order two sizes up to be safe!

I received this belt at a discount in exchange for my HONEST and UNBIASED review.

reviewText:
Men's Canvas Belt Casual Style for Jeans Brown Color

I'll admit it. I have a problem. My belly is bigger than I like. On the plus side, it's not really so big that I can't find a belt. As a matter of fact, I have quite a few belts. Some I like, some I don't like.

When searching for a new belt, I wasn't sure what exactly to get. Definitely a man's belt. Maybe I would try a casual style, just for jeans. Possibly a canvas material. And brown. Wait a second! There's one that has all that in the title! Yay!

Just to make sure I got the right size, I measured my belts. Yep, they were all the same. So being a practical and pragmatic kind of guy, I ordered the same size. Because they fit. Why mess with that, right?

The day came, I received the belt and opened the box. Wow. I've never gotten a belt in a metal box before. Cool. The belt looked just as I expected. Casual. Canvas. Brown. Manly. Arrrrhh. (wait, that sounds like a pirate... you know what I'm going for).

Anyway, I tried it on. Feels great, slides through the belt loops just fine... and keeps sliding... more.. wait... this is too big. Ugh. This is possibly the perfect belt for me and it's too big. Great.

I reached out to the seller not once but twice and waited a couple of weeks. No response. See, I had received a discount and didn't want to look a gift horse in the mouth (I'm not sure how that fits in here but it seems to work.. I'll go with it).

So, in the end, I returned the belt. It was necessary. Sometimes you just have to let go. Maybe I'll hear from the seller, maybe not. But I'll keep looking for a belt like this one from someone else. Maybe, just maybe, I'll find the one meant for me. Or my belly will get bigger and I'll buy this one again. Now where was that chocolate bar....

UPDATE: The end has become a beginning. And a belt with no end has been replaced with one that fits. I received a response only days after this review was posted. I thank the good folks at BuyReal for not only getting back to me, but making it right. It seems my conclusion of no service was premature. It's a world market: such a small world, such a big earth. My journey continues. Without the chocalate. Now that's a crime.
summary: Really nice belt... in the end

reviewText:
This is a very impressive belt. When you order the belt, you'll receive a cool black tin box with the logo of the company on it, inside of which you'll find the coiled belt. It's definitely the coolest packaging for any belt I've received. It was a pretty pleasant surprise and made me feel like I was getting a premium item. However, plenty of things that aren't great can be packaged to seem better than they are. So how was the product itself?

This belt is a really great value! I was really impressed with its solid construction, especially for a mostly non-leather belt. The mid-section of the belt is a very thick, sturdy canvas that feels like it will hold up for a long time. It will take a few days of wearing the belt to break in the canvas so that is has a bit more give, as it's fairly rigid when brand new. I first ordered a belt that was a bit too small, but was able to arrange to return it so I could re-order a larger one. Be advised, if you are looking for a cloth belt because you want something that might stretch or give more than a leather belt, this is not the belt for you (probably a canvas belt would be the wrong choice). It's a strong belt that will not stretch.

The belt is also stylish and looks good with most men's pants. I've used it with jeans, chinos, khakis, and it looks great. The brown color tone seems to go pretty much with everything. I'm really happy with the belt and plan to keep wearing it for quite a while. I'm switching it every few days for a really nice 100% leather belt that I have and it seems to hold up pretty well in comparison.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
Fantastic value
Nice looking belt.  It is true to size. It is easy to reverse. I received this item I. Exchange for my honest opinion.

I bought this belt as a gift for my husband. His current belt he has owned and worn nearly daily for the past ten years.  It is starting to get thin and worn in places. It was defiantly time for a new belt. I went with the reversible brown/black belt because my husband own two colors of boots black and brown. This way his belt can match which ever.
His main concern with a reversible belt was the durability of the pin in the middle of the belt buckle that swivels back and forth making the belt reversible. Many reversible belts just have a thin wire holding the belt buckle together. Over time with frequent twisting that wire breaks. This belt appears to have a heavy duty pin inside it that allows the belt buckle to twist from side to side making the belt reversible.
To reverse the belt you have to pull a little on the buckle then twist. Once the belt buckle is in place it then locks into place making the belt and buckle look seamless and not reversible. It also helps lock the buckle in place so it won't twist while wearing the belt. In addition to being highly functional the buckle has a beautiful rustic antique nickel look with just the right amount of shine making this an awesome looking belt.
The leather of the belt is a thick cut of good quality sturdy leather.  The black side of the belt is a beautiful flat black that shows the grain of the leather nicely. The black wraps around the edges of the belt. It looks amazing with a nice pair of jeans and a black sports coat. The brown side is a beautiful shade of brown also showing the grain of the leather. On the brown side there is a few spots were you can see the black along the edges, but it still looks nice.
After handling this belt right out of the box my husbands noticed it turned his hands slightly black. He said that just like every new leather product it is best to spray it with a heavy-duty water repellent leather spray. This will protect and seal the leather so the color will not rub off. It will also condition and protect the leather. If the leather spray is used every few months it will condition and protect the leather and keeping it from drying and cracking. His secret to getting a leather belt to last ten years.
I ordered this belt a few sizes bigger than my husbands pants size so that there would be some excess belt to tuck into his first belt loop because I think that looks nicer than belts that are too short. I felt the belt was very true to size. It fit well and looked very nice on my husband. When my son saw the belt he wanted one.  He is also a bit of a science and engineering nerd and nearly took the buckle apart to check quality of the pin inside the buckle that turns making the belt reversible. It apparently passed the test because he really liked the belt and is adamant that I get him one also.
I received this product at a reduced price for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Amazing High Quality Durable Multi-Use Belt

reviewText: So... it's a belt.  Unlike most belts I've owned in the past, the leather on this belt is more pliable. If it fails early somehow, I will update this review.  The texture on it is really nice, as is the buckle design and finish.  It is a wide belt also, which I like and I really appreciate having a reversible belt for my blacks & browns.  I'm looking forward to at least 2-3 years of use from this one.

If you're looking for a good solid belt to add to your wardrobe then look no further.  This belt is well made and super stylish.  The buckle is solidly made and looks great whether dressed down with jeans or dressed up with business slacks.  These belts would make great gift items for the man in your life.  They come in a nice metal box that is perfect for gifting.  I love the versatility of it being reversable as well.

reviewText: love it, it keeps good time.

I ordered this belt for my husband to replace his broken one. The belt came in a nice tin gift box. My husband has a size 32 inch waist and I ordered the 36 inch belt and it fit perfect without having to make any adjustments. This is a nice belt for the price and my husband was happy with my selection. What he really likes about this reversible belt is the versatility in being able to switch from brown to black depending on what he is wearing on any given day. The leather is was not as thick as I has hoped but still seems durable enough. I have seen a few reviews regarding issues with the buckle, so far my husband has not experienced nay problems. I guess the true test of time will show how well this buckle holds up. As for now the belt looks good, the buckle work great and as advertised. My son saw this belt and liked it and now I have to go and order another one. I am happy with my purchase and would recommend to a friend. I have received this product free or at a discounted price in exchange for testing, inspecting and providing my honest and unbiased review. I received no other compensation for providing a fair, unbiased, and honest review. ***UPDATE*** I am changing my rating and returning the belt. After one month, the belt buckle snapped off. I will say the seller has very good customer service and was very prompt in replying to the issue, however I had just happened to return this belt to Amazon for a refund and ordered a different belt and within an hour had a response from customer service to assist with the belt buckle.

Concerned about the fit, when the dress arrived I immediately tried it on--only to discover that it was far too short. The hem hit me at crotch level, which is not what I had been expecting. I am 5'5", and 160lbs, and ordered a Large, as I looked through reviews and at pictures posted by other customers and thought that an Extra Large would be too big. While the next size up might have been longer, it also would have looked entirely too shapeless on me, and I was too disappointed with my initial purchase to try again.
I don't know if a reorder of the same size would have resulted in a longer garment, as it seems like there is some disparity in length among customers' orders, but I was unwilling to waste time and money on the off chance I would receive a garment that fit properly.
I immediately repackaged the dress and sent it back, and thankfully received a refund in a timely manner. Now I have to go hunting for a dress with less than a week to go till my event.

reviewText: Simple. Classy. Serves it's purpose.

I'm really very happy with this wallet. It's similar in size and shape to the last wallet I was using, is well-organized, and has space for all of my items. I really appreciate the covered button too (I have an allergy to cheap metals). My one complaint would be the zipper for the change pouch----it's poor quality, sort of "sticks" and the gold-tone doesn't really complement the black leather. A silvertone zipper would have been a better match and definitely less "cheap" in appearance. I also didn't appreciate the zipper-pull, which I thought cheapened the look, so I replaced with a leather pull I had from another wallet. It was a quick fix. I hope I can use this wallet for a long time.

reviewText:
It's roomy and had plenty of card slots. I'm especially fond of the adjustable outside snaps -- it's nice to know that I can make the wallet a bit bigger just in case I have to shove an extra thousand dollars inside. Because everyone has an exta thousand dollars lying about, right? =)

Disclosure: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review. The opinions are my own, and I was not compensated in any other way for my review.

I have been trying to find a larger sized wallet so I could put ALL of my cards in there. Not just credit cards, but those other pesky cards that get lost. Like my library card, or my AAA card. Now I have room for them all. I received this wallet in exchange for an honest review and I am so glad they picked me to review it!
If you're like me, you love the feel of real leather. You will get your leather fix with this wallet! All of the stitching is solid. No skips or "skims" on the edges. The snaps on the front and inside and the zipper on the inside are all well attached. One thing I really liked about this wallet is that it has 2 areas for paper money. I like to keep larger bills hidden away from prying eyes in the checkout line, so now it looks like I only have a few dollars.
Another bonus is that the interior snap keeps the rest of the wallet from falling open just because you need to get a couple bucks out of the bill slot. The snap keeps all your cards tucked away, again, from prying eyes. Saves you from having to refold the entire wallet every time you need some cash. And since we're talking prying eyes, they thoughtfully made the id window out of a dark mesh. You need to be up close to read what's behind there.
Since I don't carry a lot of cards, I was able to put all those cards into this wallet. The card slots are all nicely "tight". You don't have to worry about your cards just falling out. You actually have to do a bit of tugging to get them out, which I like.  Behind the card/id area there are two handy slots.  I used one as a holder for an individually wrapped handy-wipe and an eyeglass cleaning wipe. Also, since I don't have an iPhone, I use the slot on the back of the wallet to hold my grocery list and coupons that I will need for that trip to the store. All of my cards and id, all of my cash (not like there's a lot), some coins, a handy-wipe and glasses wipe, and my grocery list and coupons all in one wallet. And I'm not straining to get it snapped! The two outer snaps give you the option of making the wallet tighter or looser, depending on how much stuff you want to stuff.
This is a very versatile and high quality wallet. Well worth the price of $37.99 as of writing this review. This is now my everyday wallet. Thank you Winkine for such a wonderful product!

**EDITED 5/13/17**  This is still my everyday wallet. It has gotten a few scratches, a couple water spots, some minor wear marks, but those only add to the antique look! All of the zippers and slots are still showing no signs of giving out at the seams, etc. I still have some card slots double stacked with cards and the slots still hold the cards snugly. Still beautiful, still holding up very well, almost like brand new. Love this wallet.

I love a good wallet. A huge purse must have organization and this exceptionally well made wallet does just that.
It has a lot and I do mean a lot of card spaces. 12 plus a windowed one.
When I first opened it, I went oh wow that smells wonderful.
It also contains a zippered change compartment. And a large back slot to put money or papers into.
It is beautiful and feels wonderful when you rub it. I love leather.
I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review and I really love it and use it every day.
summary: The smell,is oh so yummy. I love real leather smell.

reviewText: I absolutely loved this wallet. The last leather wallet I owned was at least 10 years ago. That is when my daughter decided it was time I passed it on to her. Since then I had used a small cloth zipper type wallet. It was hard to get anything in or out and very little storage. This wallet is so roomy that I've not been able to fill all of the slots and pockets. I like that it clasps securely shut. I also like the fact I can overstuff it and move the clasp to  still make it close. The leather is high quality. I have purposely not shown it to my daughter because I plan on holding on to this one for a very long time. It more than fits my needs. Never in my wildest dreams did I think I would have more space to fill up in a wallet.  I am showing it off to all of my friends and letting them know where they can get this great deal.

The wallet has two snaps in case you are using as a clutch and carrying a phone in the wallet. The snaps stay locked and my phone stays secure when running errands and not wanting to bring my purse.  Extremely happy with this wallet!  * Sent by seller at no charge in exchange for my honest review

reviewText: I couldn't read the writing on the bag in the product picture, so of course as soon as I got this in the mail, I took it out of the package just so I could see what it said. And I have to say that my OCD is definitely kicking in. I just feel like there's a couple of words that are missing and it's kind of driving me crazy. The bottom line says 'Free Person At Time'. I guess that could make sense, but what I think it should say is free person at one time, or I was a free person at some time, there's just so many different ways that it could have been stamped into the leather. Its just driving me crazy. The top part says comfortable and free style, and then on the line under it it says in nature... Deep respiration. I don't even know what that means, in the context of using a bag I mean... Underneath that in quotations is "dailylife". I just feel like there's a couple of key words that are missing in order for it to make sense for me. As for the quality of the bag, the canvas is a nice thick canvas, the stitching is done really nicely. The hardware is also very nice, it's not a cheap plastic material. The elastic drawstrings is very heavy duty, and closes up the back very nicely. I like the magnetic button that is on the kind of flap of the bag. There are plenty of pockets and lots of space that can be used for this bag. I definitely have an appreciation for the easily adjustable shoulder strap, I like that it's not a sin shoulder strap and also that it's not overly large. I would consider it to be the perfect medium size strap. I like everything about this bag except for the leather piece in front that has the print on it. That is the ONLY reason I am giving a 4 star rating... Promotional or discounted product provided to review.

reviewText:
Got this coat for $9. With S&H it came to $30.50. It arrived sooner than estimated. Wasn't worth it.

I measured myself and ordered an XL using the size chart. I'm 5'8", weigh 135 lbs. I like wearing size 10 clothing for the extra room. An XL should have fit me using the size chart. However, the inner liner is thick and pushes the sleeves up. In other words, the shell doesn't compensate for the liner. Also, either I have a giant cranium or the hood size doesn't adjust for larger sizes. The coat doesn't flare out around the bottom as it appears to do on this picture.

I removed the liner and it fit better. I thought about using the shell as a raincoat but I have decided to donate everything to charity rather than letting it end up in a landfill. The shell isn't water proof; it's a thin nylon material. The whole thing smells funny.

I would have gladly paid more for a quality product that resembles the expectation the picture sets.
summary: I would have gladly paid more for a quality product that more resembles the expectation the picture sets.

reviewText:
I ordered this coat for a trip out of the country. First let me say Sin. SE was great when I contacted them thinking I would not receive the coat in time for my trip. They responded quickly and let me know what I needed to do in order to be reimbursed. Turns out I was wrong and received the coat just in time for my trip. I give their customer service 5 stars.

The coat I give 3.5/4 stars I was not expecting great quality for the price but was pleasantly surprised at how well the coat held up. For those people who have never bought clothes directly from China be sure you check the sizing. It is significantly different from U.S sizing and although I bought this coat under the U.S sizing I have seen this coat on amazon using Chinese sizing so be sure you check. The coat actually ended up being a little big on me but that is my own fault. The reason I have given the coat lower marks are for the following reasons: 1) I loved the idea of the belt unfortunately it was very flimsy and of little use. I would suggest the belt be made of better material and quality that alone would make me buys this again; 2) I liked that the lining comes out and acts as another jacket, however there were no pockets, which I did not realize until I wore it by itself (I was in another country and had to pull out my passport a lot so I wanted deep pockets on the front so I could keep track of it...note the outer layer does have the pockets which was great but again the lining had none). Overall I am happy with this purchase and would buy from this vendor again.

Wow, this fell very short of expectations (which is a real pity, because it's about the only nude swim bra I could find online anywhere--and I want something water-friendly to wear under my light-colored rash guard shirts in case I decide to get wet). The sewn in pads are tiny--and that's coming from a "tiny" woman: 33" bust, 32B bra size. Also, they are so very thin. Even just in the house at a normal temperature & not being cold or anything, my nipples showed right through. It was like there was no padding. I cringe to think what would happen if I had worn this under a white rash guard and then gotten wet or the slightest bit cold--yikes. If they could up the padding a bit for modesty and sew in larger "cups", or better yet do one of those pocket-systems where you can remove the pads if you want to or add your own (in which case you could insert some thicker ones), this would have a lot going for it. As-is, my search continues.

This bra is a pull-on (as opposed to clasp bra). Maybe that's evident in pictures and descriptions, but I'm letting you know just in case. It's comfy, for sure, and offers a lot of coverage. I haven't yet tested it in the water because I'm going to return or exchange the bra I received because it is too big. I am a 34D; the sizing chart says I'd wear a large (39" bust). After reading reviews, I thought a medium would fit better. Turns out that I may be best off with a small, and I think that might make sense because I'm petite, bust size aside, and I usually wear a small in women's clothing. The issue is that the band is super loose. That said, the bra conceals my large breasts, but *that* said, a smaller size wouldn't reveal anything. The medium size isn't giving me the compression I was hoping for, and maybe a smaller size would. My bathing suit gives me a lot of compression, so even if a small doesn't compress I may keep it because the bra is lightweight and gives a lot of coverage (and will, hopefully, still give me coverage in a small). I think the lesson is that the size chart is more applicable to band than bust size.

EDIT: I exchanged the medium for a small. The band fits much better, and I still have a lot of coverage. But I'm noticing that after about five wears some of the stitching is coming loose. Maybe this is from the pull on/ pull off struggle over big breasts, or maybe this one out of thousands has a QC issue. In any case, it's comfortable and non-obtrusive during a lap swim, even if it doesn't offer a high amount of compression.
summary: Comfort and Coverage But Too Large

reviewText:
This just arrived and it came with a beautiful plain turquoise colored ring box.  It's plain so it can be decorated any way you can imagine.

Now onto the ring, the band itself is very smooth and polished to where there are no imperfections in it at all. The metal that reaches up to hold the stone is also crafted with precision. At the joints where it meets the main band there are no excesses or any defects.

The stone has a beautiful cut.  It reflects all the different colors of Caribbean topaz. The greens and purples are so vibrant and it catches light perfectly.
summary: Beautiful perfect crafted ring at a great price

ALLSTRAP -  18mm Dark Brown w/ White Stitching Thick Leather Watch Band Fits Timex Expedition

I like to include the product description because there have been many times where I would read reviews, and they are not for the listed product.  This product sell for around $10.00 for two, which is about 70% lower than what you would find comparable to those sold in stores and malls.  The product arrived within two days as promised.  The package comes with one set of band.  This is the first time I placed an order with this seller.  I had order another set of band from a different seller for more money and the product was old, the leather was brittle.  The band broke with every touch.  I almost gave up on buying watch band online.  For under $10, I gave it one last try.  To my surprise, I got exactly what was described in the picture, and the quality of the product was excellent.  The band does smell like leather and bend with no wrinkles nor did the band start cracking.  I will not think twice about ordering from this seller.  They have my business for life. My left ear has been split for more than 20 years; which resulted in me wearing clip earrings.  I ordered Ear-Lobe Expert so I could wear pierced ear rings again.  They are smaller than I expected but, it does the trick.  I put on a pair of pierced earrings for the first time in over 20 years.  I only wish they were large to stick in front and fold under to the back.  Otherwise it is a great product.
summary: I put on a pair of pierced earrings for the first time in over 20 years

I can't tell you how many times I've passed up a pair of earrings because of the weight and because one of my lobes has been stretched. (My daughter, as an infant, pulled my earring.  My lobe was not split, but close!)..The Ear Lobe Expert is the perfect inexpensive solution.

reviewText: I purchased these because I have noticed that many times, my post earrings do not stay straight and I know that I have had damage to my lobes in the past, thanks to babies pulling my earrings. These help hide the lobe damage and give support to your lobes to prevent additional damage.
summary: 5 Months Supply Ear-Lobe Expert by Gurgle Technology
